Such actions could be ascribed to the past culture where there are plenty of fresh ingredients and so forming this unthoughtful habit that still remains until present time. Ċ Furthermore,as I mentioned above,the quality of the products nowadays has changed a lot since the modern era began,which leading people to many discoveries that boost the effective of the methods of raising crops.Unfortunately,there are drawbacks such as vegetables and livestocks could not maintaining the original aroma.In other words,scientists nowadays intervene deeply into the development of raw ingredients which often seen in the case of genetically modified corns and meat.As a result,foods lost their value and not being well treated as before. Ċ In order to tackle the problems of food wasting,the government should promulgate a law that charging excessive foods.By doing that,many remnants will be save and society could so far avoided this problem.Moreover,raising people's awareness of potential diseases on their left-overs is extremely necessary and could be held by means of telecommunications. Ċ In conclusion,although it is true that foods are being grown faster and easier than ever before,still,food ordering should be strictly controlled by the authority.Going along with it is the telecom which holds an important responsibility in warning people about the capability of threads from the residues.Therefore,people could understand and mitigate the waste.

prompt: Some people believe social media is very important in our daily life, other believe it is waste of time. Discuss both the views and give your opinion.
essay: Social networking sites such as Facebook, Instagram or Twitter have evolved so that they become an indispensable part of our lives. They are considered by some to be beneficial for us; others assume the contrary. This essay will discuss both points of view before my closing verdict. Ċ On the one hand, social media is a major source of entertainment for all people of all age category. Some applications , YouTube, for example , provide us with the content specific to our interests and the opportunity to group up society into the communities according to their outlooks on life. Moreover, social networking sites can be very useful in terms of education and work. For instance, the Microsoft Teams program allows schools and colleges to educate the students remotely retaining high quality. The same can be applied to the companies. Therefore, positive feedback on the online medium is quite reasonable. Ċ On the other hand, unlike in most public places , people can exploit the freedom they are given in social media. In other words, if someone behaves in an unacceptable manner , there is no one who would punish him. For instance , as racism is one of the hottest issues today ,many online users tease each other addressing their races knowing they can not be retributed. Also, these issues might inculcate the wrong overview of life for very young people.Unfortunately , these trends make the sceptics of social media be more adamant about their standpoint. Ċ To sum up, although social networking sites have some positive impact on our lives, they are also detrimental to a certain extent.

prompt: Some psychologists recommend that to overcome stress in daily life we should do nothing at all for a period of time in the day. Ċ Do you agree or disagree ?
essay: Some psychologists suggest that we should not do anything for a period of hours in the morning and evening in order to reduce tension on a regular basis. I agree with this statement to some extent, but this is not the only solutions. This essay will highlight the other methods of overcoming such threats and express an opinion at the end. Ċ On the one hand, The first reason I believe that daily workload can be prevented by not doing any tasks for a while will help to mitigate stress. This is because people spend a plethora of time for working from the sunshine to sunsets without taking any break. In addition, some workers perform an office duty in a weekend. For instance, if they take a rest by doing various activities and spending quality time with their loved ones, it will make them psychologically relief. Furthermore, it assists to develop a strong relationship between family members. As a result, it can lead a delightful and healthy life. Ċ On the other hand, despite the living by doing nothing, travelling to the new places might be a better idea to cope mental problems. The commuting of the favourite areas with kith and kin provides a sense of happiness. For instance, a person who lives in the city as moving to the countryside on holidays for taking fresh air and escape of work burden can definitely supersede the mental overload. Similarly, the communication with others regarding work pressure would be beneficial to subside tension. Ċ In conclusion, although spending hours without having any responsibility can mitigate the worries, it does not work effectively every time. In my opinion, taking breaks and visiting to breathing taking and quite part of the country will certainly a relief mental pressure.

prompt: To date, various nations in the world has open opportunities for women to participate in the armed force. Some individuals consider the trend beneficial due to its gender equity nature, while others disagree with such policy.  To what extent do you agree with such a procedure? ladies in uniforms with guns
essay: Nowadays, it is common to see more and more nations having opened opportunities for women to participate in the armed force. There is a great deal of controversy surrounding this issue for a long time. Ċ In the previous decades, women are usually considered helpless in our army. It is a discrimination. They are mainly given tremendous roles on their families rather than other things. It is their responsibilities to concentrate on family members. For instance, nature a child to be a productive adult. Ċ However, accompany by the women rights rising, women have been given multifunctional position. They could vote, teach, drive a taxi, capture criminals and so on.They could accomplish various things efficiently over our imagination, and also take good care on their families. Take Israel for example, there are massive riots and wars happened almost everyday. The demanding on armed force is necessary. They could feed their babies and fight for their country at the same time, it has been taken for granted in their culture. All residents should defend their country. Ċ Therefore, female could join the armed force has been a new trend all over the world. We should treat this issue in open-minded. It could happened that women be a part of our armed force members.

prompt: More and more pollution and wastage produced. How common people are affected by pollution? What an individual can do to prevent it?
essay: In recent years, air pollution and wastage has risen dramatically, which has caused number of deterimental affects on common population. This essay will discuss some of those causes and measures that can be taken by individuals to deter their effects. Ċ One of the most significant issues pertaining to degrading quality of air is respiratory diseases. As an example, pollution in the city NewDelhi is so high that breathing there for 3 hours equals to smoking a cigarette as per the recent WHO survey. This is a pressing problem for common people because most of labour and essential workers spend most of their time during the day outside to fullfil their jobs. Therefore, they are exposed to pollution during the large portion of the day, disturbingly, which can decrease their life-span. Not only this, pollution has resulted in rising temperatures which has resulted in global warming around the world, which again brings more stress and difficulties on pockets of people as they will now have to spend more electricity to survive the hot day. Ċ Nevertheless, a number of measures can be implemented to control the increasing pollution, best of which is increasing the dependency on renewable resources for electricity rather than resources such as coal. In the recent survey, national pollution agency stated that in number of cities across india, 20% of the pollution is being caused due to the thermal power plants. Furthermore, mandating the use of high-efficiency vehicles and electric cars can create a significant reduction of pollution created by transport. Ċ To recapitulate, two main issues due to increased pollution that has been directly affecting common lives are respiratory problem and rising temperatures. However, such problem can be prevented by switching to non-conventional resources and electronic vehicles which will eventually control the falling air-quality.

prompt: Question : An increasing number of people in these days prefer consuming fast food to home prepared ones. Why do you think this trend happen? What soft of problems might it bring into society?
essay: Over the last decade, consuming fast food have seen in the society life style. People would rather to buy ready-made meals than home-cooked ones. This essay will discuss some reasons why this occurred and examine the consequences of this worrying trend. Ċ The main cause of this problem is prolific increase in the number of fast food restaurant. For instance, on nearly every high street there are Mac Donald's and Kentucky Fried Chicken which they mostly open 24 hours per day. This ensuring that people who are busy in their work or even the students prefer consume these foods. Another cause of an inceasing consuer is interesting advertising that encourages people to buy. There are many exaggerate advertising that offer cut of price on their foods. That will lead consumers to think that they should order as long as foods in discount price. Ċ The effects of this have been and will continue to be very serious. The most problematic is helath problem. It will be a large increase in helath related dieases, especially diabetes. This debilitating illness means people have to be injected with insulin for the rest of their life. Furthermore, the social life may be influenced. Ready-made meals which are a quick and easy option to order lead people to change their eating habits. This will result in their family interaction since they have not enough time to eat together with the home prepared foods. Ċ To sum up, it is evident that there are several causes of increasing the number of fast food consumers. Thus, there are variety of negative effects as a result. Society must ensure to prevent this problem from deteriorating further.

prompt: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. Ċ Write about the following topic: Ċ Some people think that hosting an international sports event is good for the country, while some people think it is bad. Discuss both views and state your opinion. Ċ Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. Ċ You should write at least 250 words.
essay: Several individuals believed that bearing international games such as football or tennis is more advantageous for a community. However, others argue that it brings disadvantages. Personally, I advocate the first view opposing the second one owing to the fact that international sports provide the region's visibility. Although it is financial resources squandering. This essay will shed light on both sides of the view and provide anecdotal evidence to prove the arguments. Ċ On the one hand, arranging a worldwide event gives a national outlook. In others words, these events come with the press coverage exposing the land to stakeholders, entrepreneurs to the earth. Let's take South Africa as an example, the UN scientific study in 2011, pointed out that this state held the football world cup and since it, the country became 10 times more famous than in previous years. As a result, it soared the tourism attraction and businesses. Moreover, it became the overriding source of revenues for three consecutive years. Ċ On the other hand, part taking world play is resource frittering. Because of this, much money is spent on the construction of stadiums, mesmerising accommodations. Furthermore, providing a secure environment for all individuals involved, a huge amount of money is deployed. For instance, the scientific research carried out by the Oxford University in 2007 after the German world cup in 2006 showcased that more than 5% of the German PIB were utilized in solely one game city, enough money to build 500 schools and pave 300 roadways. Hence, the event was regarded as a failure by a plethora of critics. Ċ In conclusion, notwithstanding the international sports to be considered as taxes spending, it has undoubtedly rises the state' economic growth. Therefore, I still advocate the view. In addition, I recommend the local ruling power bears the organization of sports events in their lands.

prompt: Modern societies need specialist in certain fields, but not in others.Some people think therefore that governments should pay university fees for some stundents who study subjects that are needed by society.Those who choose to study less relevant subjects should not receive government funding.Would the advantages of such an educational policy outweight the disadvantages?
essay: Many students go to universiry nowadays because they want to have a degree, to make a career.Some of them have to go to university because they need a qualification and advanced studies to get a better job.A university offers a wide range of subjects and also different fees for each course. Ċ Modern societies need specialists in any field because without somebody who can explain and give the work form genereation to generation.Without this kind of persons, that field would be dead because there are no workers nor any progress.If governemnts paid university fees only for students who choose to study subjects like: chemistry, engineering, physical science or other, many students would be disaadvantaged.Some of them would choose a course which is paid eventhough they don not have the abilities required.A thing like this would involve more disadvantages than advantages because it would eucourage people to choose only certain courses. Ċ We should understand that this world needs something from every field, to go on, to make a whole.For example, how can a house with a wonderful constuction be complete if there is not an artist,a painter to give that house colour.Governments schould come up with a solution that encourages every stundent to reach performance, to go beyond his limits, to be the best. Ċ To sum up, a modern society can bring opportunities to everyone, to fulfill their dreams, so governments schould think twice before making a decision about universities funding because this is a serious problm,especially for students who have to borrow money form banks. Ċ What do you think about my essay? Please let me know your opinion and what band score do you think I can get with this essay.Thank you!

prompt: some people think that criminal behavior has genetic causes. others believe that it is circumstances that lead people to commit a crime. discuss both views and give your opinion.
essay: Crime has resulted in various disadvantages in the economy, such as mass murder. A number of people perceive that the genes are the most important factor for illegal activities whilst the remaining feel that situations which direct to execute an offence. In my opinion, it is the latter which most influence criminal behaviour. Ċ To embark on, the first cause of felony is genetics. This implies that some genetic material from parents associated with traits generally low intelligence, poor diet, impulsivity, and hyperactivity can be passed on to children. Furthermore, it triggers a variety of mental disorders like schizophrenia that leads to depression, which is the root of several offences. For instance, a study prepared in 2010 involving 10 individuals inheriting the above characteristics depicted that after 10 years 9 out of those beings ended up in prison. In other words, DNA inheritance can be a baluster for offensive manners. Ċ Secondly, the conditions in which a person is residing can oblige a human towards a misdeed. Moreover, constantly being bullied and poor family background can produce a habit of stealing or fighting among peers. For example, a survey conducted in 2021 in American jail demonstrated that most of the convicts have needy household upbringings. To put it more simply, the state of affairs can alter a personality as well as perspective. Ċ In conclusion, there are numerous explanations of an illicit manner particularly parents and circumstances. Although, if we do not suppress these matters, then, there will be a significant increase in criminals especially adolescents. Thus, it is beneficial to promote equality and strict laws against offenders.

prompt: TASK:People spend their free time among the same group as themselves. Whereas some people enjoy spending time with all age groups. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
essay: People are social beings by nature so it is normal for them to seek the companionship of others. But, an interesting point to see is the variation on how people choose their companions, and among several aspects to be considered, age is the common one. Certain reasons are observed on why people spend their leisure time with the same age group as well as those who prefer to go with different ones. Ċ Apparently, a person feels more comfortable around friends with the same age because they are more likely to have common interests such as hobbies and lifestyles. Thus, chances of being left out from these kinds of groups are low. Also, in games and sports, competing against someone at the same age level is believed to be fair as nobody has far more advantage in terms of experience and skills. Ċ On the other hand, some people prefer to be with a different age group, in most cases older than them, because they believe it can help them improve their knowledge and skills. Firstly, an individual can gain a diverse perspective of certain things by listening to the stories and experiences of others who are at a different age level. Secondly, in playing a game regularly with players who are more mature and experienced, one is bound to adhere the techniques and skills of their teammates as well as their opponents. Thus, a person benefits from this by way of improving his skills. Ċ In my opinion, it does not really matter much if you are in the same or different age group, either way could be beneficial to someone. I think what matters most is how you feel about being in the group, which one makes you happy and comfortable may it be during your leisure time or any other time.

prompt: Some people prefer activities and lifestyles in hot climates while others prefer ‎activities and lifestyles in cold climates. Discuss both views, and give your ‎opinion.‎
essay: Many factors are considered when it comes to deciding where to live in. Climate has been always an important reason for choosing the right place. While some people believe that warmer weather is more suitable for them, others think that a cold climate is better. The two sides of this argument will be thoroughly analysed and discussed in this essay before drawing a reasoned conclusion. Ċ On one hand, by living in a warmer city, people could have more outdoor activities such as jogging or going on a picnic. Sadly, doing so in cold and cloudy weather would not be convenient for many. As growing up in colder places, many people, in the UK for example, prefer to go to Spain or countries in Latin America to enjoy the sunny weather. Ċ On the other hand, many believe that colder climates are energizing. Some people can't stand the heat and prefer chilly regions for it make them more active and fit to do their daily activities. The poetic and romantic feeling of cold is also prefered by many to have a walk or even a run. For instance, many tourists who live in hotter countries like UAE or Saudi Arabia travel to London in the winter to enjoy walking in the streets. Ċ To summarize, the two sides of the argument concerning the adequate climate to choose for doing activities have strong supports. However, after a thorough analysis of both sides, I personally believe that a colder climate is more suitable for active and lively individuals.

prompt: Nowadays, many people cannot read or write What problems does this cause? What measures can governments take to solve these problems?
essay: In today's world, there are a number of people who are unable to read or write. Though this case has some problems, it could be alleviated by many effective remedies. Ċ On the one hand, a number of problems are resulted from the inability to read or write. First, when in important situations, people who have difficulty over reading and writing may not fully comprehend the information. As a result, they are more likely to be misled and do harm to themselves. Laborers, for example, who are incapable of reading, may be exploited physically as they do not deeply understand what is written in the contract. Second, since a person cannot write, he may run into a wide range of troubles, especially when it comes to dealing with the government and verifying legislative documents. For instance, those who are unable to write may not be able to finish required papers, such as making a petition to send their local authority, or giving signature. Ċ On the other hand, there are two solutions that can be implemented to tackle this issue. Chief among them is that the government should invest more money in education. For example, they should build more schools, especially those in the remote areas, or launch campaigns to raise people's awareness about education. Thus, people are likely to change their mindset about the importance of learning, and be able to approach it more easily. Secondly, there should also be well-trained staff who take responsibility for supporting these people. As a result, even if someone does not possess complete writing and reading skills, they would be able to get through administrative formalities. Ċ To sum up, regardless of the fact that there are some people who can neither read nor write, this situation could be effectively avoided by some ways suggested above.

prompt: choice of learning method Essay topics: Some people believe that students in schools learn better when they study in groups. Others say school students learn better when they study on their own. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
essay: Nowadays, many believe that group learning will be more effective than individual learning for students, whereas, there is a contradictory notion about the superiority of individual learning. In this essay, will explore both sides of the debate and give my opinion. Ċ To begin with, individual learning enhances the concentration of students. This is because learning alone will prevent pupils from distraction from their teammate's discussion. Especially, to a lot of students who are introverts, it is onerous for them to come up with an idea when they are in crowd. Furthermore, studying by their own will improve the ability of working independently. A group include a lot of students in different levels and some are more talented than others will increase the possibility of develop the habit of just relying on these talented students. When they work alone without support from other, they learn by themselves; hence, their other soft skills like researching, seeking, also improve. Ċ On the other hand, group learning has is own benefits. Several students with different strengths and weaknesses can make up for each other. Specifically, if one person gives an idea and other will develop and nourish it, make it to become the best version of this group by giving their perspectives. Human being usually finds hard to realize their own mistakes so working together is a good way to take improve myself by objective and friendly judgment from teammates. Besides, it will improve teamwork skills of students. Even if you detest working with others but in our modern society, it is unavoidable. Therefore, it will give the students the best preparation for the working environment in the future. Ċ To sum up, two types of learning method have their own pros and cons. In educational environment we can combine these and use them flexibly in particular period of learning as well as in specific students.

prompt: Proper function of prison is to punish criminals and life in prison should be hard. Do you agree or disagree?
essay: There is no shadow of a doubt that imprisonment life should be tough, and the main purpose of prison house is to penalize the offenders. I am in variance with this view because, in my opinion, the objective of jails is to rehabilitate criminals, further this essay will argue that punishment does not help to reduce the crime rates. Ċ To begin with, prison provides an opportunity for criminals to change their behaviour. This is because several developmental programmes are introduced in jails to teach them social skills and improve over the mistakes. For instances, the USA Psychology Department reveals in a recent survey that over 50% of culprits are less likely to indulge in crime after serving their time in prison as a rehabilitation centre. Therefore, prisons are meant to ameliorate the criminal’s life. Ċ However, some people believe that the primary role of prison should be to serve punishment to the people who do not obey laws. If criminals face brutality then there are few chances that they want to alter their nature. In addition, they will not be able to make a connection with society and remain isolated. Hence, their probability of reoffending crime will be increase. For example, a study by Federation University revealed, 60% of crooks again break the laws after treating with cruelty. Ċ In conclusion, although prisons are built to punish the offenders, I believe that if these jails used as establishment centre, then offenders become betterAdd an articlea betterThe noun phrase better person seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article. Ċ show examples person in society and the rate of crime will also be reduced.

prompt: Some people think that children should obey rules or do what their parents and teachers want them to do, but others think that children who are controlled too much cannot deal with problems well by themselves in adulthood. Discuss both views and give your own opinion. childhood under supervision
essay: It may be open to debate whether children should obey rules or behave precisely as their parents and teachers expect. Some believe in obedience, while others fear excessive control on children will erode their problem-solving ability in adulthood. In this essay, I will outline the essential arguments of both sides and come up with my own opinion. Ċ Advocates of strict upbringing build their point of view on the well-established theory that good manners are not developed by nature but by nurture. Innocent, energetic as children are, they cannot automatically grow into persons of great refinement. For this purpose, rules are introduced and children are brought up to polish their behavior accordingly. Ċ Yet that raises concerns that they will grapple with a variety of problems when they grow up. Docility involves being comfortable with existing rules, recommendations or even warnings, but the keys to successful problem solving do not necessarily fall into these boxes. When creativity is required, as is often the case in adult life, they will find themselves mired in confusion. Ċ Personally, I take on the pro side. It is noteworthy that even the most gifted children are not mentally developed yet, which means they do not have sound judgment and strong self discipline. Unshackled by rules or teachings, they are susceptible to temptations. Ċ Admittedly, both sides make sense. Children can only acquire good manners under the guidance of rules, teachers and parents, while their problem-solving ability might be undermined in the process. Despite the disadvantage, I support the idea that they should be placed under control, since it helps them navigate childhood without yielding to lures.

prompt: Rising university fees and scarce employment prospects for graduates have led some people to say that universities should not teach arts subjects,like philsophy and history and only offer practical degree courses that maximise chance of employment Ċ to what extent do you agree or disagree?
essay: It is argued by a few people that universities should only focus on practical subject courses, due to limited job opportunities and expensive tertiary education. I partially agree to this statement, which I will explain in following paragraphs. Ċ To start with, in this contemporary world, as the population is on the rise, there are fewer places left for graduates.Every sector witness unemployment as there are myriad of candidates applying for a particular position.Thus, studying pragmatic subjects, such as accountancy, management or finance, is proactive step to secure the future. To exemplify, a lot of students are motivated to pursue commerce to make sure they won't be jobless in the future as this sector is on the rise to accommodate ever increasing candidates.In addition, certain degree's like philosophy and history have no relevancy in this technological advanced world. These subjects are reduced to books only, can not be applied to the real world. Ċ In contrast, although the pragmatic degree course provides benefits in the near future, arts courses can help in better decision in life.Philosophy renders better analytical skills which help a person to take right steps before commencing. Likewise, history teaches us about our previous generation, such as about work patterns and their modification throughout the decades.Moreover, these subjects improve writing skills to further increase chance of acquiring the job.For example, lots of companies hire people on the bases of their analytical and language ability to communicate better and taking the right decision in given circumstances. Ċ To conclude, while practical degree's are relevant to the future requirements, learning arts enhances interpersonal skills.

prompt: Some people feel that global warming should be dealt with by governments. Others feel that it is responsibility of individuals in society to solve the problem. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
essay: To reduce the increased temperature due to human activities on earth must be halted with the authorities' contribution. Although this notion is favoured by some parts of society, others have a counter-argument that to tackle this serious issue and apply people have to take some actions on their own. I agree with both arguments, and this essay will discuss the importance of each category to diminish this significant issue in the upcoming paragraphs. Ċ To begin with, the government not only helps to decrease the level of global warming by implementing strict laws but also can be aware of the population to minimize this problem. To elaborate further, the uses of fossil fuels by the industries at large scale and exhaust fumes produced from huge uses of private means of transportation by the people could be halted or reduced when the authority will employ solid law against overuse of these resources. For instance, a survey conducted recently has revealed that 40% of pollution can be minimized globally if society follows the issued law and order with responsibility. Moreover, the government can arrange awareness programs in urban and rural areas to save the environment by growing more trees. As a result, soil erosion and climate changes can be stopped long term. Ċ Nevertheless, this is an individual's responsibility as well to maintain the earth's climate. The first and foremost contribution by a human to change their habits toward lifestyle. They must travel in public transportation rather than their vehicles. This will reduce the level of exhaust fumes which are harmful to our atmosphere. To illustrate, people can use public transportation for commuting rather than their vehicles. Secondly, more biodegradable products must be utilized worldwide to reduce the global warming problem. Additionally, people could prefer those things which could be recycled and reused in future for a specific period. Hence, the environmentally friendly demeanour assist in reducing the temperature of the earth's surface. Ċ To conclude, after discussing both views, I unequivocally believe that the authorities and communities have to work simultaneously to solve this major issue. Government and inhabitants should be responsible at different stages to deal with global warming and get back to nature.

prompt: TOPIC: some people believe that team sports are very important for children to succeed in their career, others disagree. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
essay: Nowadays,team sports are a prevailing problem all over the world. Some think that team sports are crucial for the success of children in their career. Meanwhile, other people disagree. I think both opinions have several reasons. This essay will explain them. Ċ On the one hand, team sports are a suitable way to approach thinking skills of children which relate to the success of their career. Team sports support and inspire a deeper knowledge about thinking skills and logical strategies.Therefore, children can bring things which they learn in their team as meaningful experiences in order to achieve their goal. It is obvious that Vietnamese government always encourage children to participate in team sports which help children strengthen the development of thinking skills which are acquired their success. Children have many chances to have a bright future. Ċ However, apart from the benefits of team sports, this have some disadvantage which parents wanna prevent. It is true that Children are not old enough to handle severe problem in their team. Team sports do not always have a cooperation and harmony among members. Therefore, It leads to the competition and discussion of team. Moreover, most children can spend time-consuming task and filter out ideas on their thinking skill to apply for the success of their career. For example, Vietnamese scientists investigated a football team that most member who are children gain a bit experiences and misunderstand together without the guidance of adult. Ċ In conclusion, team sports play important role for the knowledge which serve the success of children in their career. However, this way have some drawback for them.

prompt: Some people think that exercise is the key to health while others feel that having a balanced diet is more important. Ċ Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
essay: Discussions related to maintaining health are among the top nowadays. Due to this reason, many opine that it is very essential to do any kind of physical activities related to gym or sports in order to remain fit. Others, however, contend that the diet plan is more important to ameliorate health. I shall discuss both these views and comes to the logical conclusion in further paragraphs. Ċ To commence with, exercising proves to be very mandatory in present due to the working schedules followed by masses.in other words, the requirement of mental-work might be more in the jobs or work than the physical movement which in turn develops sedentary lifestyle among humans. Moreover, in order to digest foods which are high in calories and proteins which might cause serious health issues if any kind of physical work is not done. For instance, research by the University of Delhi address that to cure diseases like high blood pressure or indigestion, running will be required to be embraced on a regular basis which eventually burns calories and boosts the immune system. Visting gyms or playing sports on a consistent basis is a perfect solution for this. Ċ On the contrary, adopting a healthy diet is also crucial to mitigate issues related to fitness. Firstly, if one follows the meals which come naturally from the god then chances for them to get infected by some diseases or problems might be very less. Secondly, weight levels could easily be managed or reduced by initiating good meal plan which does not need to practice the physical activity. For example,a report by the Fitness department demonstrates that the requirement of sports only arises owing to the consumption of fast foods. Thus, well-being could easily be maintained by eating natural foods. Ċ To conclude, According to my view Although focussing on taking balanced meal is necessary, the benefits acquired by doing physical activity will be more valuable because of the schedules followed by humans in which time is barely given to the exercise. Therefore, an equal amount of exercise along with a balanced meal is necessary to ensure good strength.

prompt: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. Ċ Write about the following topic. Ċ Group or team activities can teach more important skills for life than those activities which are done alone. Ċ Do you agree or disagree? Ċ Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. Ċ You should write at least 250 words.
essay: It is believed that cohort activities provide more relevant growth abilities than individual ones. Personally, I agree with the view owing to the fact that these tasks teach the cooperation techniques applied in real life. Although it has its disadvantages. This essay will shed light on both sides of the view and provide evidence to prove the arguments. Ċ On the one hand, group task boosts individual cooperation capabilities. In other words, these activities enhance a wide variety of techniques such as : to be a good team player and communicating efficiently with others. Let us take football sport as an example, better coordination and understanding are needed to be well-succeed, the same skills, which are must in real soul. As a result, individual or collective goal is met, communities get connected and social issues are tackled. Moreover, this is the overriding reason for successful professionals worldwide. Ċ On the other hand, individual roles provide a unique personal experience to a person's heart rather than team roles. Because of the high demand for responsibility applied in these cases, it plays a pivotal role in in-person life. 60% of single players were reported to be the most skilled to deal with a wide range of existence day by day challenges than squad gamers for instance. Hence, it makes them prepared to deal with life issues. Furthermore, despite these groups of people tend to become more isolated and experience loneliness, they are fullfledged in terms of competencies. Ċ In conclusion, indeed, group duties train a crowd to endure real-life challenges than single ones, notwithstanding personal activities has their benefits. Therefore, I agree with the view and I endorse communities to enhance more team-based duties for sake of communal collaboration and understanding.

prompt: Some people believe that it is a good idea that older people continue to work if it is possible for them to do. Do you agree or disagree ?
essay: It is widely believed that elder citizens extend work till their strength in the body for them. I strongly agree with this view of point, as I believe that aged people can work in a good manner after retirement also. Ċ First of all, the old persons can create more positive vibrations for the young population related to their job. This is because they do not depend on others money, this can lead to creating a problem in their family. For example, if older public stay in large cities is more expensive compared to a rural area, because of that fact needs more money in their life. While it is true that senior nation managing their health is difficult, so taking rest is also essential for them. Ċ Furthermore, if the persons are idle without doing any job, which leads to getting easily bored. A key reason for that does not have any responsibility for the next generation. For instance, in past everyone lived in a join family, but now the current situation is totally different where family members moved to everywhere depend upon their facilities. While there is no question that older human beings are good to work, it is clear that their family also support their effectiveness. Ċ In conclusion, the younger also provides more support to the older human kids for working after retirement, which will also have a positive effect on their family members. In my opinion, I think that both the older and younger person does not depend upon others, and this help to maintain a good relationship with the community.

prompt: Men do most of the high-level jobs. Should the government encourage a certain percentage of these jobs to be reserved for women?  Use your own knowledge and experience and support your arguments with examples and relevant evidence. Different jobs for both gender
essay: With the rising of women's consciousness, there are more and more people advocate gender parity. Especially in work place, men dominate the more high positions than women do currently. I believe the government should protect a certain quota of the high-level jobs for women. Ċ The first reason is, obviously, men and women are definitely different in physical aspects. Thus, when it comes to the job regarding physical factor, for example, cement porter, women tend to show the less abilities than men do. Besides labor conditions, there is no reason for women to reach the same achievement as men do. Ċ The next reason I am on the position of supporting the government reserve the jobs for women is that it can stimulate the diversities. Because of sexual stereotype, the public often think women are emotional and cannot think as logical as men do. In my opinion, that argument is quite unfair since men are equal mad and exaggerated. Hence, women can use this kind of personality adequately, thinking in more considerate and detailed ways. Particularly for the higher positions, they usually need to manager people. I suppose that having more gender can boost more spark in career. Ċ Having said that, the opposite people argue that the behavior of limiting the certain percentage for specific gender is ironically against the parity itself. However, the history proofs that women had been treated as second people for a long time. Compare to men, women got the working right after World War two, which was less than a hundred year to now. Therefore, I strongly support that ensuring the women working right is the right path toward a equal society. Ċ To conclude, it seems reasonably clear that the government should be encouraged to make a growth of high position quantity for women.

prompt: Some people think that women are generally more peaceful than men as their characters are naturally more nurturing than aggressive. To what extent do you agree/disagree.
essay: In the sophisticated era, women play a cardinal role in the life of every person because they work equally like men in every profession. According to the some women are more calm and they possessed good personality. Also, they are more upbringing than men. I am personally inclined to agree with the statement that women are peaceful as compared to men. This essay will elaborate the possible reasons behind it in the subsequent paragraphs. Ċ To begin with, women are participating equally in all professions like as men such as doctor, police force, business, and movies. They have a great role in everyone's heart. Furthermore, they have umpteen responsibility, they have to work as a mother, daughter and a wife. Women always supporting for social news and always stay active in society site. Hence, there is a significant role of women in the activity of every person and they should be helped to the citizens in any good or bad situation. Ċ Women are more peaceful and better personality than men, because most of the men like to introvert in themselves and they always like to do indoor activities instead of involving in any other social activities. They mostly enjoy indoor activities. Such as, watching television, listen to music and playing some video games. However, women always decide to do each and every task in their life and they prefer outdoor activities and want to become extrovert. They have a plethora of obligation, but they do not lose their temper easily. Thus, women have good characters because they are extrovert and multitasking. Ċ To recapitulate, it is said that women have a lot of will power as a result, they handle every situation in their life. A woman is considered as the backbone of the man.

prompt: People these days watch TV, films, and other programmes alone rather than with other people. Ċ Do the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?
essay: There is an argument tells that nowadays people love to enjoy TV programs by themselves not with others. This may lead to several advantages and demerits. I believe that the benefit of this technology innovation may outweigh the disadvantages. Ċ To begin with, technological development reveals a lot of easy ways for people to entertain or gain pieces of information current days. For example, news from over the world might be worldly known just in seconds. There are several entertainment choices provided on the internet and TV and it helps people to enjoy based on their preferences such as mothers prefer to watch soap operas in films platform while fathers prefer to watch sport on TV. They do not have to argue with each other because there are many sources that provide entertainment. In addition, it brings a positive impact to education because accessing educational content is way much easier currently and children may watch it alone for their study without being bothered or bothering other families. Ċ On the other hand, social life might be unaware recently because man is more comfortable enjoying TV programs or other entertainment by themselves. For instance, years ago TV is considerably rare in the house so that only rich families have them. In my hometown, back then citizens used to watch TV in that particular house or in the village office together. It was built a family bond among them and people became aware of each other. This situation is commonly rare these days and it is the negative effect of technology. Hence, the demerit of this innovation cause lack of social life amongst citizens. Ċ To sum up, there are several benefits of technology innovations in terms of gaining pieces of information more quickly, various entertaining contents and so on, while the negative impact has to deal with individualism between people. I believe the advantages might outweigh the disadvantages by wise using the technologies.

prompt: TOPIC: In many countries, students who behave badly in class are expelled from their schools and never allowed to return. Many consider this an effective way to educate while others disagree. Discuss both sides and have your own opinion
essay: In many schools, students are expelled for their poor behaviours. Some people argue that this is a suitable punishment to have a better educational environment. However, it is also disagreed by many others. In this writing, both sides will be analyzed before a conclusion is reached. Ċ On the one hand, tough punishment is crucially important to strengthen principles of schools. For example, when a student is dropped out of school for stealing a mobile phone, there is a great possibility that other bad students will not risk their educational prospect for a similar mistake. This will certainly bring about a better school. Thus, the benefits that come about when misbehaving children cannot continue their study can be seen. Ċ On the other hand, education is significantly crucial for anyone's future. The fact is that e person's social status is best enhanced with high educational level. Whereas, students that are expelled from school usually end up with crimes and drugs. Therefore, it is reasonable that children should not be out of school for any reason. In addition to this, students are very young and vulnerable to impulse actions that cause serious consequences. They should be forgived and educated with an effective method instead of being pushed into a risky society at such an early age. Ċ As the above illustrates, the punishment of forcing poor students out of school leads to a more self-disciplined environment among students. However, the detrimental ramifications seem to outweigh the benefits. Such excecution negatively affects the students and the society as a whole. It is hoped that all schools will give bad children more chances to correct their mistakes.

prompt: responsibility to society. topic: Some people think they have done all they should do to society by paying taxes, but other people think people should take more responsibilities. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
essay: It is quite common these days for citizens to have a responsibility to take actions to contribute to a better society. With a conflicting view about how much responsibility they have to take, some citizens regard paying taxes as the whole duty they have to their country and community. Ċ Advocates believe they have fulfilled their responsibility and duty through paying various tax, such as the VAT and income tax, since government could enhance economy to run smoothly as well as invest in social systems. For example, with tax revenue, the government is able to build more high-speed trains and improve the healthcare system. However, what government can do with tax revenue is just from the strategic level, while the dwellers can take more responsibilities in many other aspects. Ċ An ideal society is not only determined by economy and high-quality lifestyle, education and reputation also need to be taken into consideration. Everyone in the society is a role model for children who are most likely to imitate other's behavior, thus to be an educational and motivational person is indeed an important responsibility for people to take in order to foster the young generation. Ċ In addition, there are also occasions when citizens need to put their best foot forward to establish a good reputation for our community. It is hard to imagine what others would think of you, if you throw the garbage on the street only because there is not any trash cans in the vicinity. Ċ In conclusion, my view is that although tax revenue can solve part of social issues, just paying taxes alone is not enough for citizens to fulfill their duties. It is better for them to do something effective in person that contribute to education and good reputation.

prompt: TOPIC: All education (primary, secondary and further education) should be free to all people and paid and managed by the government. Do you agree or disagree with this statement?
essay: Nowadays, whether all individuals should be entitled to unchargeable education has been receiving a great deal of public attention. While I partly agree that training should be sponsored by the government, I disagree it should be costless for everyone. Ċ Free education is reasonable for several reasons. First, everyone has equal rights to education. This means both the wealthy and the poor are entitled to learning, which makes those who are impoverished have the chance to be lifted out of poverty and get better career opportunities and future. If not, only children from privileged backgrounds can access to education and be better prepared for their future, and juveniles from poor background learn that all attempts, effort they make are useless, and they could not positively change their lives, which perpetuates a cycle of the wealth gap and postpone the country's development and prosperity. Ċ In the other hand, I believe that education should not be free to everybody. This is because most people do not appreciate the value of free training. To be more precise, the number of pupils would be irresponsible to their studies and lose motivation to strive, which leads to low academic results and a waste of investment of government in those students, and a financial strain. Besides, the government only should sponsor for gifted individuals such as Mathematical ingenious students, which helps them fulfil their dreams, and their capabilities would boost national advancement in numerous fields such as science and economy down the road. Ċ In conclusion, although free education is advantageous in a great deal of aspects, it should not be uncharged to all individuals.

prompt: When new towns are planned, it is important to build more public parks or sports facilities than shopping centers for people to spend their free time. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essay: In the contemporary era, there is a heated argument over the issue that town planners should have a preference for more parks and gyms to be created than business districts and shopping malls. A lion's share of the society favours it, however the rest goes adverse it. While I understand the concerns of people who hold this opinion, it seems to me that shopping centres are just as important as parks and gyms in a municipality. The following paragraphs would highlight my personal perspective with an apt example. Ċ I see eye to eye, with the central idea for various reasons why public facilities are crucial to metropolis inhabitants. First of all, they provide suitable spaces and equipment for people to exercise. For example, people can go jogging in the park and play tennis or basketball at the sports stadium. That helps to keep their bodies fit and it also elevates their mood during the day. Besides, parks and sports facilities are good spots for people to socialize with their neighbours. People can connect with others when they are playing sports or talking casually with passers by in the park. A harmonious relationship between residents helps build a caring and friendly neighbourhood. Ċ On the loggerhead, some critics go against the above discussed assertions. As a result, parks and gyms give the city dwellers all kinds of benefits, I would like to point out the importance of shopping malls to the district. Firstly, a shopping centre could make shopping more convenient for the local residents. It would enable them to easily purchase things in town and transport them home with less effort and at lower cost. They would not need to spend extra money on transportation or shipping of the goods. Secondly, a shopping mall can provide employment. Locals can find work in retail, maintenance or security of the mall, hence earning an income to support their families. Ċ To Conclude, although parks and sports facilities serve as places for exercise and social activities for city dwellers, I believe that shopping centres are equally important, since they can provide job opportunities and convenience to the town residents.

prompt: Some people suggest that childern do not understand the world of work and schools should make all teenagers spend a short time working as well as studying academic subjects. To what extent do you agree?
essay: Nowadays, working and the meaning of working for children is of utmost importance and learning how to work from an early age has played a primary role for children. I believe that children should be taught so as to figure out the world of work. This essay will explain the benefits and the drawbacks of working and studying for students simultaneously. Ċ First of all, working for a short time can provide children with great opportunities to gain experience before entering real and large workplaces. In this regard, they can become familiar with a wide range of professions and job requirements. In this case, if schools make it compulsory that all teenagers spend a short time working as well as studying the school's subjects, it will be beneficial significantly for them in that they can be experienced and, in return, students are more likely to be valuable workforces for both the society and themselves. From a psychological point of view, being experienced sooner than the expected time can broaden their horizons and, in the next step, open the door to children to be successful in their careers. Ċ Secondly, another advantage would be that working shortly from an early age can give adolescents a sense of responsibility and identity. Therefore, they are more likely to be upstanding members of society in the future. However, it is worth mentioning that working at school time would have some disadvantages as well. For instance, they may not concentrate on the academic lessons, and if this happens, they will not obtain qualifications. Nonetheless, the drawbacks are not confined to this, and possibly children will face a number of problems. Ċ To sum up, although working at the school time might have some shortcoming, the benefits are far more, and I agree entirely with spending a short time working whilst children are going to school.

prompt: The care of old people is a growing problem. Some say the government should care for old people. Others say that it is the family’s responsibility. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
essay: An increasing problematic issue looks after aged people.It is argued that caring for old people is whether the response of their relatives or the government .I believe that this topic has to handle both by their family and the government. Ċ Initially,the main task of governance is to solve the problem of the public.This means repairing the road or look after aged people.For instance,a few years ago my neighbour lost her husband and nobody have left to look at her from her blood relatives,social care have solved this problem and they send to local caring agenda which support by the government.Thus,the government has to play a role in this position. Ċ On the other hand,the meaning of family is to help each other in any case.That means,nobody can deny that we all will be aged in the future and so everybody needs to care from somebody.For example,In Turkey where I grow up, the population of kids of parents are more than one kid because of the reason of the fear that when they aged they need somebody to look after them. Furthermore,the family how looked their kids in their required time later on while their parents will get older that kids, when they grow up, must look after their elder relatives. Ċ In conclusion,it is surely true that we are ageing time by time and this makes us addicted to other body because of ageing.This makes a problematic matter for both their children and the governments.I would say in my centre heart that issue should be couraged firstly by their family and then by the authorities.

prompt: IELTS QUESTION Some think that giving a weekly allowance to children will help them to face less problems when they are adults. Do you agree or disagree? ANSWER:
essay: Allowance gives motivation for children to do their work and it is less difficulty when they became adults. To accord this statement, I completely agree it will be useful for children to manage money at young age with proper guidance. Ċ Some of the benefits of allowance for children are ability to learn about finance, responsibility about money, consequence of decision making. For emergency period, pocket money helps them if they miss their bus pass. Children will learn about money management skills. It gives them to satisfy their needs. For instance, it allows them to buy their own necessary item like books. It motivates kids to get their chores done. Ċ On the other hand, if children given weekly allowance they think less about money. Paying kids for doing chores make them to think working for money isn't fun. They demand for complete each activity in the home to pay for it. Sweets are very cheap; they use allowance to buy them plenty. If they get money freely they will use it lavishly. They use it for bad activity like smoking, drug, and so forth. For example, the report says that children are spending money for smoking and also illegal activity. Ċ In a nutshell, though giving an allowance to children by weekly helps to know about benefit about money but it will destroy their lives without any supervision. So parents should be high alert on giving allowance to children, they will spend amount on unessential activity. Parent should take care about all the expenses which relax children to focus only on studies.

prompt: The best way to reduce poverty in developing countries is by giving up to six years of free education, so that they can at least read, write and use numbers. Ċ To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essay: It is often argued that making primary schooling free can be fundamental to guaranteeing everyone accesses to education . Some people believe that it can be considered an effective solution to poverty. In my opinion, I completely agree with this view and think that free schooling is the best way to fight poverty. Ċ Firstly, Government should make elementary studies free of charge because it can help students not abandoning school and then become positive and productive members of society . There are plenty of families in developing nations that cannot fully afford to send their children to school. Consequently, these students will be forced to abandon their studies and be exposed to be unemployed and in some cases criminals in order to earn money to afford their living . For example , researches show that nations in which the level of unemployment is higher suffer more from economic problems . That is why this method can be a useful solution to this issue . Ċ Secondly, primary learning helps children to develop several skills and abilities. In other words, education will help individuals to grow because they will obtain a better understanding of life and get more knowledge and skills . therefore , pupils will gain financial stability in the future because they may have the possibility to land a good job and a high paying salary. Ċ In conclusion , I strongly believe that making elementary free of charge can offer a long term solution to the country's economy because it may reduce the problem of abandoning schools and helps children to develop skills and abilities .

prompt: Tourism is causing environmental problems all around the world. What are the main causes of this? What are some solutions?
essay: It cannot be denied that the ongoing environmental issues are due to the dramatic increase in the tourism industry all around the countries. This essay will explicate the two causes of this phenomena and explain how we can tackle this obstacle in the coming years. Ċ To commence with, the primary reason for this occurrence is deforestation that causes climate change. In other words, people are cutting down the trees for the construction of roads to promote tourism. For example, the recent news published by “The Kathmandu Post” was written that on the way to Muktinath, there occurred a dangerous bus accident due to a landslide. To mitigate it, the possible reason to halt this situation requires the legal authorities intervention as the government can impose some law to maintain the number of cutting trees. Also, the plantation of various useful flora programme should be carried out by making some new legal laws for the implementation. Ċ Another problem is the overuse of natural resources that causes global warming. To explain it, the consumption of petroleum products for the tourist is rising day by day that leads to environmental pollution which can create different disease. For instance, recent research done by The Tribhuwan University revealed that The Kathmandu valley which is known as the city of tourist is more polluted and also the kids in that area are unhealthy than the other places. To cope with this, people’s attitude should be changed to forge a compromise with their consumption behaviour to protect the environment. In addition, the government should also consider the reduction of this situation. Ċ In conclusion, a decrease in flora and fauna and high consumption of fuel leads to natural disaster as well as pollution. Also, these problems can be solved if human try to maintain the natural world with rule and regulation which should be imposed by the government.

prompt: People have little understanding of the importance of the natural world. What are the reasons for this and how can people learn more about the natural world？
essay: Currently, humans do not know specifically about the necessity of the ecosystem, which is essential for their survival. There are several reasons for this, but also a number of measures that we can take. Ċ First of all, maybe people understand that the environment needs preserving, but as it can bring about financial benefits, they neglect that thinking and just care about the short-term benefits instead of the long-term ones. Therefore, people exploit all the natural resources, which provides them high revenues to increase their profits. Take logging, as an example, forests and jungles, known as the lungs of the Earth, are being destroyed heavily now for trading since this is a high-income industry. As a result, many natural disasters having an adverse effect on the life of humans occur, such as soil erosion or severe floods. The other cause is that despite being taught how important nature is, people still do not have the awareness of protecting it. For instance, some individuals deliberately throw litter on the streets and beaches, hunt wild animals illegally and dump toxic waste into the seas by design. This results in the presence of plastic in the oceans, the extinction of rhinos and the death of marine creatures. Ċ However, to lessen the problem, the main idea is that governments and the public must join hands together. First, policymakers should launch some propaganda campaigns to raise the awareness of their people, but those plans need to suit different age brackets. To illustrate, as for kids and youngsters, the message can be conveyed through vivid videos and real illustrations, including animations or stories on television about how important the ecosystem is and what the repercussions are if the natural world is kept on being polluted. As for adults, authorities should issue strict regulations about protecting the environment. Take Singapore, as an example, anyone who lets garbage on the roads will be fined for $10. Consequently, everyone will realize and pay more attention to the dangers threatening the planet now: global warming, natural depletion and so on. They should stop polluting the Earth and reuse whatever they can instead of throwing away. Ċ In conclusion, nature can be harmed and due to its importance, if it is destroyed, humans will be affected seriously. So protecting the environment is just like protecting yourself in front of any catastrophes.

prompt: Assignment: What are your thoughts on the idea that television has turned out to isolate people instead of bringing them together?
essay: While ostensibly the television has turned out to isolate people, actually it depends on how the uses manage it. Everything has its advantages and disadvantages. Therefore, to have a positive, the owner should use it wisely. Ċ Most of the objects are created to have a useful usage, but sometimes we are the ones who create negative consequence. Many people think that now the television has made people to enclose themselves in the house and stop having contacts with friends and family. In my case, my parents are always busy. However, there is a time when all the family comes together and it is television time. Therefore, the television doesn't isolate my family, but make us come together. Ċ I have a friend who doesn't talk to anyone when she is watching television, and she tends to watch it alone. Nevertheless, she doesn't watch television for a long time, so she also spends a lot of time with her friends and family. Ċ Some people think that when the neighbourhood only had few television sets, people tend to have closer relationships. If we think in the same way, should we have few fridges in the community, so we can spend more time with our neighbour? Ċ In conclusion, determining if the television has turned out to isolate people or not, it depends on how the owner use it. The television set is a tool for us. Therefore, we should use it wisely in order to have positive influences such as bring the family or the neighbourhood together.

prompt: It is better for children to grow up in the countryside than in a big city. Do you agree or disagree? Use specific reasons and examples to develop your essay. small town or a metropolis for a child's good?
essay: The countryside, in comparison to big cities, outlines some widely different characteristics, environmentally speaking as well as socially. And, taking into consideration the rather special atmosphere children need to live in a healthy way as well as assure their well-being, which place is better to live in remains a prominent question. Ċ Personally, I do not fully agree to the fact that growing up in the countryside is more beneficial to children than living in a big city, mainly because each one of the two different places are devoid of particular opportunities for children. Ċ Firstly, if living in a small village on a plain where green is a dime a dozen and fresh air is the well of immortality, provides infinite and everlasting jubilation, shortage of Wi-Fi, transit and easy access to information may be a source of worry and surely will fret you even with the healthiest of environments. Thus, it is, definitely, a nightmare to live disconnected from social life. Ċ Secondly, for a child, a big city would give him multiple opportunities to learn new skills, discover their talents and embrace their career at an early age. He or she would also be allowed to have all sorts of medical and diet help to have a strong body at the age where they need sufficient nourishment to be developed. Ċ In conclusion, although a sane, clean and fresh atmosphere is absolutely needed for a little child, the city might be giving him or her the chance to have a well-balanced life in the long term by bringing the whole world to the kid's hands to explore.

prompt: Some people think that uniform at school is unnecessary and should be banned. Ċ To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essay: Certain individuals believe that students should not be allowed to wear uniforms while attending schools as they find no benefits in doing so. However, I completely disagree with this notion. In contrast, I think children should be encouraged to dress in uniform because by wearing them, they become easily distinguishable from ordinary people which on some occasions, can act in their own interest. Ċ Firstly, wearing a uniform not only gives the person the confidence and prestige of being a student but also helps him to be identified easily in the public. For example, if a student has been involved in a car incident, authorities and police can easily reach out to his family and access his personal details by simply referring to the school that the student's uniform belongs to. Furthermore, wearing the same dress can be an indication of levels of discipline and cohesion in the school. Ċ In addition, Because children spend the majority of their time studying in classrooms, a school-provided unifrom can significantly reduce the costs associated with purchasing clothes for youngsters. this will be particularly helpful for low-income families who might face difficulties providing stationery and dressings for their children. For instance, if a child from such a family has been given a uniform from the school, it will help him to avoid being ostracized as well peer pressure that he may encounter in his class. Ċ In conclusion, I must say I strongly disagree with those who assume uniforms do not serve any purpose. I believe they must be compulsory as they have proven to be beneficial for both the students and their families.

prompt: Psychological illnesses may not be as obvious as physical disabilities or illnesses. Nevertheless, they are just as disabling in their own way. Society, however, is more accepting of those with physical than psychological illnesses or disabilities, The latter being regarded as a taboo subject sometimes. To what extent do you agree with this view?
essay: It has been observed that mentally challenged people are less likely to be accepted by the public and physical disabilities are treated with more empathy than mental illnesses. I strongly disagree with the statement and believe that society is getting more tolerating to mental disordered people. Ċ To begin with, people have been more open to psychological illnesses because they have become more aware of the importance of mental health in their lives. When people are mentally ill, they are not able to work productively, to form positive relationships and manage life’s challenges. For instance, it is probably difficult for a person with speech anxiety to present his or her project in a work meeting as well as communicate effectively in public. As a result, people have paid more attention to their mental health by doing physical activities, adopting healthy diets and practicing meditation. Ċ Another reason is that some people with mental disorders are geniuses with hidden talents. Children with autism or hyperactive might be considered mentally disordered atSuggestionin the first place because they come across with uncommon behaviours. However, many of them have shown their interests or talents in music, technology, drawing or circus performance. For example, a successful Vietnamese acrobat was diagnosed with autism at the age of three. The more he grew up, the more he showed his interest in circus performance. With the support of his parents, he kept practicing and now works as a professional performer. Being aware of these cases, not only families, but also the society have sought methods and treatments to cure and open their arms to people with psychological disorders. Ċ To conclude, awareness of the public to mental health and special gifts of mentally challenged people has been enhanced. Thus, they have become more empathised towards those people and supported them in many different ways.

prompt: Some people prefer to work on school projects with a group, while others would rather work alone. Ċ Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
essay: Most educational institutions encourage students to indulge in teams since it helps in better growth on individual as well as social development. Group activities improve few essential qualities such as confidence, creativity and decision making. On the other end few scholars prefer to go solo. However, there are community who prefer that scholars should involve with groups and I agree with their opinion. Ċ Moving to the side there are scholars who unite together to form groups. They are observed that they achieve their goals productively. Due to different perspective of people existing in the team, many ideas come into the table while brainstorming. If one got stuck with a huddle, then there are others to solve the matter, thus guides them to improve the productivity and checks time balance for the given assignment. For instance, in a mathematics assignment suppose one is good in geometry and other in trigonometry, hence supporting the other kind. Unity also helps oneself in upgrading skills by learning or practising from the others in the crew. Ċ On the other side, there are individual who completes work single handedly. Hence the radius for brainstorming is confined or limited. This can mostly represent that the scholar is an introvert who is less confident to confront his thinking or views with others resulting in to finish the task all by himself which may conclude to degrade the level of overall performance. For example, a member has strong ideas but is unable to confront others due to his shy behaviour. Many teenagers do not like to share success credits with others while few fail to fit for the team due to lack of sufficient or required skills, can be substitute cases for acting separately. Ċ In a nutshell, from my opinion scholars should be motivated to work in groups rather than solo, Afterall teamwork is the basic requirement in any work field as nothing can be achieved singly. Not only the institute even parents should encourage them to unite to achieve any job requirements.

prompt: Digital communication technology, such as email, instant messaging and social media, has improved communication and connections between people. Ċ To what extend do you agree or disagree?
essay: It is indeed true that electronic media has transformed the methods of conversation and connection among the general public. I completely agree with this statement due to two main reasons. Firstly, people can communicate at any time with their relatives. Secondly, social networking websites helps in making new connections for the public. This essay will intend to analyse both arguments in detail with relevant examples. Ċ First of all, these days, the populace can contact their friends and relatives in a few seconds. With the invention of email, phone messages and social media websites such as Facebook and Twitter, people can share their information, emotions, and secrets easily without any delay. For example, I daily talk to friends through social media and exchange thoughts and useful information. In contrast, it was not possible in the past and masses often had to use letter and telegram to share information. Therefore, web media has revolutionalized the methods of conversation among masses. Ċ Moreover, people can develop a huge friend circle with digital technology. These days, if people have the desire to proliferate their social group then they may use Facebook and Twitter to connect new people. It has been observed that this digital platform is far more convenient and effective to connect public as compared to conventional methods such as group meeting and social gatherings. For example, nowadays, the maximum populace has 100 to 200 friends on Facebook without physical meeting. Hence, the public may increase their social circle with digital technology . Ċ In conclusion, electronic media has changed the way of conversation and connection between the general public. I firmly believe that with this innovative revolution not only people can communicate at any time with their relatives but also this enables them to develop new bondings with other people.

prompt: write an essay explaining your own difficult decision. a personal decision, career decision or a family decision . explain why the decision was difficult , and describe the pros and cons (pleas rate out of 10 and tell me if there is any mistakes)
essay: After I finished the first year of high school , I had to choose between entering the scientific section or the literary section. This was a hard decision for me because I was up in the air about what I wanted to do after high school. My family pressured me to enter the scientific section because if I didn't enter the scientific section, I won't be able to get a good job. Ċ When I got my grades for the first year I realized that I have failed In math and physic. I didn't have to think too much about my decision because the Head teacher told me that if I entered the scientific section , I will finish high school after four years instead of three. And that was the deciding factor for me to enter the literary section .
