Ċ On the other hand, most folks believe that nothing is better rather than using money and have fun in their lives. It can be argued that consuming expenditures and purchase everything they want to bring joy in their lives. In addition, they are merely thought about the present time and want to establish the best moments. For instance, sometimes people arrange a party or journeys together due to the fact they want to be blessed and using their lives, do not care about money just having entertainment. In my opinion, nothing better than living in a moment and consuming wealth and create memorable times with your families. If you wish to enjoy your alive and consume payment, you have to create a balance between them. Ċ In conclusion, both arguments are acceptable and I mentioned my reasons previously, but in my view, they have to create a balance between consume pay and save the expense.

prompt: Nowadays for many people the Internet is replacing regular books. What do you think will happen in the future and what is your opinion?
essay: Internet these days is changing the general book format into the face of online copy and information. In my personal prospect, if the situation stays like this, in future, the huge amount of books will available online, and to buy the hard copy of it will be difficult. These days the audio samples of books are also provided by the publisher on the computer. Ċ Firstly, online drafts are getting popular these days. For an instance, before, people prefer to buy the physical Storybooks and the Novels and they like to keep these in a study room, but now the tablets and the laptops are overtaking their place as the public download the copies on it and carry these with themselves, so they can read whatever they like and wherever they want. It increases the amount of study material one can carry in his/her pockets. Whatever we want to know is just type away from us, as various search engines like Google, Bing, Ask, etc. are present on cyberspace. This will save the cutting of trees for papers. Ċ Moreover, the audio samples of a printed work can be prepared on the net. For example, if a person doesn't like reading, but like listening, he/she can get tapes to listen. This encourages writers to record their work and earn more by selling it. In future, the internet will serve as the vast source of knowledge, as most of the information is stored on it in form of data. Ċ In conclusion, In the modern generation, the humans will depend on the web for information and knowledge, as everyone can see a wide range of literature and other fun books on it for a less amount of money. This approach is exciting and it will save our environment.

prompt: Nowadays many people work part or full time from home. Some people say that working from home has many benefits while others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
essay: It is irrefutable that where people to work is a crucial importance. It is a highly debated issue whether people choose their home for their jobs or if others try to go outside of house to work. Both situations have their own pros and cons which I shall discuss in this essay. Ċ Working at home is what some people prefer because of its advantages. It is very convenient people not to go outside of home and spend a great deal of time for commuting. Working at home saves people's energy to concentrate on their duties, which means workers do not bother themselves to think about how to go to their workplaces, which style they have and what food that they eat at work. What is more, some females really like to work, but they have children who need some special cares. If these women can work at home, doing both of their duties will be very easy. Ċ On the other hand, working in workplace is very important. Firstly, some tasks need special equipments which cannot stay at home such as huge machines. People have to go to workplaces to do their duties. For example, some individuals have to fix and maintain some systems which were set for production process in factory. Secondly, though going to work is very time consuming, working in workplace with colleagues has discipline which cannot achieve at home very easily. In formal atmosphere, workforce has better efficiently. Therefore, it is less waste time during work time. Lastly, communicating with other people reduces some work pressure, because other employees can give some firsthand experiences. Ċ In the final analysis, working at workplace has merits which cannot achieve in solitary environment of house. Some jobs cannot do at home, being in workplace is necessary.

prompt: In modern society, some people argue that schools become unnecessary as student can study at home via the Internet. Do you agree or disagree?
essay: Nowadays, it has become common to get an education online. In this contemporary era, some individuals argue that studying in conventional schools is not significant and opine that studying online at home is the need of this century. I completely disagree with this notion and, I would explain the reasons for my opinion in this essay. Ċ To embark on, schools are the places where we can make our new friends and we can enjoy studying with another pupil. Additionally, it would become quite boring to study from home through the internet. Moreover, the pupil can also get habituated to the habit of waking early to attend their grade, which would teach them to schedule their time effectively. For instance, Cambridge Research unit has made it clear in their recent research that 90 per cent of the student who attends regular classes are good at time management when comparing it to the scholar who is given online tuition. Ċ On the other, the demerits of online education are many, firstly, students can get eye strain while studying on computers and as a result, they have to wear power glasses from an early age. Secondly, children cannot get personal attention at the home, as well as they cannot improve their hand-writing skills through the screen of the computer. Furthermore, students lose interest in their education if they do not study with their classmates and the online classes rather feel boring for them. For example, when I was in middle school, I had suffered from some illness and consequently, I had to take online classes and was not able to cope with it. Ċ In conclusion, even though it is comfortable to study from home through the internet, however, the advantages of studying in regular schools are many and traditional schools cannot be replaced.

prompt: substantial coverage of crimes in media Giving detailed descriptions of crimes on the press has bad influence, so information of this should be restricted. To what extent do you agree or disagree with you this statement?
essay: Undeniably, crime rate is on the increase. However, substantial coverage of crimes on the mass media has dire consequences to people's life. Therefore, I personally agree with it and people should minimize the underside effects. Ċ Obviously, in-depth news reports about violent contents may potentially pollute children's mind. To be more specific, no matter what the news are, children tend to imitate the actions and behaviors shown on the press. They suppose that violence and death is a normal part in modern society. As a consequence, adolescents subconsciously behave aggressively and cruelly which may give rise to the upsurge of juvenile delinquency. For instance, it is reported that under the contents about brutal fightings, serial killers' influences, teenagers are more likely to have antisocial behavior or illegal activities than those who do not watch. Thus, censorship of this kind of information is necessary. Ċ Another point to consider is the fact that detailed descriptions of crimes may lead to the loss of justice and security of everyone. In other words, news and documentaries illustrating criminal acts may generate fear and anxiety towards people as well as the reality of life. Watchers often mislead to the belief that they are living in a dangerous world. Hence, they develop a sense of insecurity and mistrust if they watch detailed account of crimes on a regular basic. Moreover, because images of this information shown on television are extremely obsessive and disturbing, people do not realize the positive side of life surrounding their environment. Ċ To sum up, although some people argue that considerable coverage of crimes can be beneficial, the adverse impacts of it are undoubtedly inevitable. For this reason, government should censor the contents of mass media to maximize the advantages and lessen the disadvantages.

prompt: The current trend in education is to move away from traditional exams and instead have continuous assessment over the school year. What do you think of this trend ?
essay: As the times pass, many things change in the sphere of life. Similarly, there have been changes in the education system as well. On big change is that these days instead of having bi-yearly exams, students are assessed throughout the year via assignments, tests, projects etc. I think that it is a positive change. Ċ To commence with, the most important advantage of the current trend is that students are connected with the studies year round via assignments, projects, tests etc. This leads to another advantage that because of continuous learning, they get assessed for the whole year. This allows teachers to notice the shortcomings of students early and thus, can help them in a timely manner. For instance, in the sixth standard, my teacher had observed that I was not performing well in geometry. So, she gave me extra assignments to help me cover my weaknesses. Ċ Furthermore, another advantage is that it allows parents to be aware of the work of their child in the class from the very beginning of the session. If parents do not keep a continuous eye on the performance of their kids, then they can easily go off track. The current system provides continuous feedback to kids and thus, parents can take necessary actions for the improvement of their child's performance. For example, a recent study shows that 80% of bad habits in kids can be improved by continuous monitoring and efforts. Ċ To conclude, I think that the current education scheme has eliminated a few of the shortcomings of traditional system. It has also brought many advantages such as continuous assessment and correction of students by teachers and parents can easily keep track of the performance of their kid.

prompt: Job migration to the wealthier countries. An increasing numbers of professionals, such as doctors and teachers, are leaving their own poorer countries to work in developed countries. What are the causes? What are the soulutions?
essay: Professionals, such as doctors and teachers, have a tendency to leave their developing countries to find jobs in developed countries. This essay will examine main causes of this issue and possible solutions. Ċ The two main causes of leaving countries among professionals are the deficiency of high-quality facilities and slim chance to promote. When these white-collar workers live in developing countries, they can not have cutting-edge technology. This way, they stand no chance of working as their desire. For instance, teachers in some rural areas have to commute about 10 km to the schools on foot. Also, promotion is another key factor that deter those professionals from staying in the poor countries. Their salaries are not sufficient, although they indulge themselves on their occupation. Doctors or teachers definitely opt for developed countries where they can devote themselves to their passion without worrying about money. For example, the majority of people in Southeast Asia tend to find scholarships to study abroad and settle down there. Thus, lacking money and poor condition are deterrents for the professionals. Ċ Some possible solutions to this problem are investing money in facilities and have more incentives for white-collar laborers. High-tech devices and machines undeniably make workers focus on their works because they provide them with comfort when working. As a case in point, online lessons emerged in my country in response to a pandemic allow teachers to finish their duty at home, providing them a safe environment to educate the students. Consequently, they are more fanatical about their works. Besides, governments should have some special policies for the professionals because they can draw their interest in their occupation. Ċ In conclusion, low salaries and low-quality facilities are two main factors that make the professionals leave their poor countries. However, we can significantly change this situation by improving the working condition and providing these people with sufficient salaries.

prompt: Gasoline cars are still better than electricity cars. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
essay: Everything has two sides and Gasoline cars are not an exception. In the last decade`s, it seemed like the most normal way of transportation people, but nowadays many people criticize it. Ċ We must acknowledge that many people prefer gasoline cars than electricity cars, because it gives them a better chance to repair and maintain it. Using mechanics or using a little information, which they gain from friends or books or maybe internet resources. In addition, driving big gasoline cars make people feel fast and strong, which makes it hard for them to change it with electricity cars. Ċ Nevertheless, many people believe that transportation should become cleaner and greener. There are many scientific researches proves how much electricity cars are going to help our environment. Applying these researches is what we really need, so we can grantee a clean air for us, for our children and for next generations. A good example of an electricity cars company, which producing fast big modern cars is Tesla. If People who admire sport cars proceed in replacing gasoline cars with one of Tesla cars, they will realize the truth about electricity cars. Ċ Moreover, electricity cars expenses are less than gasoline cars, because of cheap electricity prices. In addition, electricity cars are easier in implying with technology equipments, so people enjoy driving and navigating easier. I completely disagree that gasoline cars remains useful than electricity cars. Ċ To sum up, there are many evidences that electricity car more useful than gasoline one. Even I recommended that, governments should proceed with some laws, forcing people on replacing gasoline cars with electricity ones.

prompt: Some people think the technology makes life complex, so we should make the life simpler without using the technology. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essay: Nowadays, it is true that Technologies are developing such as computers, cars, phones and so on. As a result, they carry some problems with themselves like pollutions, traffics etc. It has been argued that Some people think that the development of technology has made our life more complex, and the solution is to live a simpler life without that. I partly agree with this idea. Ċ It is no doubt true that nowadays, with modern technology such as cars, it is quite common to see these cars in the road. The most families have own a car. Owning to this, everyone can encounter with some problems like compound traffic problems, air pollution and noise. Therefore some people think that modern technology seriously influences our life and causes a confused environment. On the other hand, other drawbacks of technology People had jobs to work in the past but now, the most people can't work or find job because of technology can do some actions instead of about 10 employers. For example, a worker can control engine of car with computer instead of Worker strength. Ċ In spite of about the arguments I tend to believe that more and more people can't imagine our life without modern technology such as computers, smartphones and so on. We use computers to do some exercises like Microsoft word and also to communication with skype or email. As a result, we save our time, paper and shorten distance because of computers. Furthermore, we know about smarthpones. So they make our life much simpler. We just started to use smart phones which can take pictures, surf the internet, play games, take notes and set an alarm on the phone. As a result you can do everything in one smart phone. Ċ in conclusion, in my opinion, developed technology is better for people because at the same time adequate knowledge of people is developed much more.

prompt: Health services are the basic necessity for a person. Private companies have made the health services quite costly for ordinary individuals. Do the advantages of private health care outweigh its disadvantages?
essay: It is commonly believed that the extravagant price of health care has been attributed to the involvement of private enterprises, despite it being a fundamental need of every resident. The principle advantage of private health hospitals is that they offer better facilities than state-own institutions, while the main disadvantage is their extravagant treatment cost making ordinary people impossible to access the healthcare services they need. This essay agrees that its demerit outweigh the merit. Ċ Firstly, providing high-grade equipment and labour forces are the principle advantage of private medical care. This is because a private company makes enormous profits from treatment feeSuggestionthe treatment feetreatment fees of its patients, which is relatively higher than that in public hospitals. Consequently, a big proportion of this profit is invested back in equipping more advanced medical machines and facilities, as well as hiring and training top-notch specialists to serve its clients. For instance, in 2018, MedCare company allocated almost 55% of its profit to purchase MRI machines and building new treatment rooms for its patients. Ċ However, the main disadvantage of the private healthcare system is the high price itself. To be more specific, only the affluent have enough money to pay for examination and operation which are conducted in private hospitals, while a person with low salaries may struggle to pay for medical bills. For example, a survey in 2019 indicates that an ordinary office worker would need up to 1 year to compensate for the money spent on one visit to a private hospital for general health examination. As a result, such poor people would not have equal access to the services in profit-making hospitals, despite receiving medical treatment is a basic necessity. Ċ In conclusion, although profit-oriented hospitals may offer equipments with higher quality than government-owned facilities, their high medical costs still outweigh its merit. If the private sector offered a supportive policy to lower the treatment fee, more people would have equal access to its state-of-the-art facilities which it provides.

prompt: Many animals are being hunted to the brink of extinction in order to fulfill the demand and greed of mankind for decorative purposes as well as for other reasons, such as traditional medicine. How can this issue be tackled?
essay: Human life is dependent on the animals. But, human beings have put many animal species in danger of becoming extinct with the unchecked and extensive hunting for its selfish motives such as house decorations, pleasure etc. It is very important to protect the animals and some measures for this cause must be taken. Ċ To commence with, the population of the world is increasing and to meet the housing and food demands, more and more forests are being cut. This leads to the loss of the natural habitat of animals, which endangers them. The wildlife plays an important role in the food chain. If any element of the chain is lost, then the existence of elements is endangered as well. For example, honey bees help in cross pollination, which is necessary for the growth of the crops. To protect the animals, multiple steps can be taken. Firstly, the government must educate its people and explain the importance of animals for the existence of human life. This way the community will value them. Ċ In addition to this, animals are killed for the ornaments, decorative pieces of art, medicines etc. As an example, elephants are trapped and hunted for their tusks. Therefore, it is very important to save the animals from the brutality. The administration must make stringent laws to punish the people who commit the crime of illegal hunting. Furthermore, it must define the minimum forest cover as well, so that no builder tries to cut the forest to build residential or commercial buildings. For instance, in Coorg, the council has marked the areas to protect the existing forests and the natural habitat of elephants. Ċ To conclude, humans are dependent on the animals for food, leisure and money. Hence, we all must collectively take steps to protect them from extinction. There should be awareness in the community and strict laws to punish the ones who go against the law.

prompt: Some people prefer to live with a roommate.Others prefer to live alone.Compare the advantage of each choice.Which of these two options do you prefer? Ċ use specific reasons to support your answer.
essay: It is true that in many countries , people of all ages tend to choose to live alone and claim that it can be more advantageous for them .While some individuals argue that living with a roommate can have some obvious merits, I take the view that living alone can be the best choice. Ċ On the one hand , there are some reasons that why the population choose to have a roommate at home . The strongest reason is that being alone can lead to having a strong feeling of loneliness which could cause some mental health problems. For example, many studies show that being alone for a long period of time may engender some mental troubles such as depression and anxiety . In addition , sharing a house with other humans can be an economic decision because that means the rent of a house will be divided into two or more sums of money and therefore they will pay less money . Ċ On the other hand , living alone can be a suitable choice for several reasons . Firstly , this approach can help persons to build a strong and independent personality . In other words , facing all problems alone and without help can undoubtedly empower the mindest and increase the will of a person also being responsible for all household and daily tasks can learn the population a lot of personal skills such as discipline and work hard . Consequently , those persons have more chances to succeed in life and achieve their goals in the future . Secondly , being without a roommate at home can give individuals more personal space because the entire place is their personal bubble . For instance , people who share their residence with other humans have less privacy which is not healthy for the development of the personality . Ċ In conclusion , although I think that being with another person at home can have some advantages , I strongly believe that being alone is the best decision because it provides more privacy and helps persons to build a strong character .

prompt: The number of children that read books for fun has dropped dramatically in recent years. What are the reasons for this? How can we encourage children to read more?
essay: In today’s technologically advanced world, where daily new inventions are taking place, the number of children reading books as a hobby is decreasing drastically as children are opting for other new hobbies to pursue. Ċ There are numerous reasons for this drop. First of all, easy availability of various digital gadgets. In today’s generation children are succumbing to peer pressure to play virtual reality games. Also, children who want to read books are considered boring and not cool which has led to more and more children pursuing all kinds of socially acceptable activities to fit in their social circle. For example, a research conducted in the USA proves that more than 70% of school children can be spotted at various game zones rather than libraries. Ċ Secondly, children tend to imitate their parents. For instance, when they see their parents working on computers all the time, they would want to do that too. Therefore, it is important that the parents should be aware of this fact and take appropriate measures to introduce their children to the habit of reading books at an early stage of their life. Thus, by making sure that they sit with their children and help them read instead of bringing back their office work home. Furthermore, schools should also take initiatives to promote book clubs and bring back the old culture of reading for fun in todays new generation. Ċ To conclude, it is not too late to motivate children to read books for fun. If appropriate steps are taken more and more children can be influenced to read and this drastically dropping trend can be encumbered.

prompt: Some high schools have a requirement that students must complete a certain amount of volunteer work in order to graduate. WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT THIS TYPE OF REQUIREMENT? Give details to support your opinion.
essay: Being a student with a requirement like that, I strongly disagree with the idea of putting it into one of the graduation limitations. The original meaning of this was to help the student develop better and cultivate the sense of volunteering. Nevertheless, the meaning of volunteer work has completely altered after implementing the graduating requirement. Ċ From my perspective, the definition of volunteer work is an act of dedication to the community or society wholeheartedly without asking for any reward, thus it cannot be quantified. Once doing so, some students will complete the minimum amount of volunteer work with a hasty and rash attitude, and they just regard it as a chore. To them, volunteer work is more like a task than an act inspired by the inner heart, and it defies the original meaning of volunteer work. Moreover, the quality of work done by volunteer workers is also declined because of the above-mentioned attitude among students. Ċ On the other hand, volunteer work seems to be unrelated to a person's academic achievements, which made the restrictions unreasonable. Students may lose their diplomas just because of their insufficient volunteer work "scores", which hinders them from applying to universities. Ċ In conclusion, the implementation has defied the meaning of volunteer work radically, and it completely undermines the quality of volunteer work. Without the limitation, students can devote themselves to what they love more, while those who have fond of helping others can do volunteer work more wholeheartedly. For these reasons, I think the minimum requirement for volunteer work should be lifted.

prompt: Some people say social media do more harm to the youth. Other people say they do the great to the youth. Ċ Discuss both views and give your opinion. Ċ Give reasons for your answers and include examples from your knowledge and experience.
essay: It is argued by some that social media can exert more havoc to youngsters. Nevertheless, others regard it as beneficial to adolescents. I consider it to be neither harmful nor extremely useful to young people. Ċ Social media, as its name shows, encompasses several technological tools such as Twitter, WeChat, YouTuBe and so on in which young people can acquire novel skills that may be absolutely contributive to one's academic study. By using them proficiently as well as frequently, pupils can master capabilities that they may have difficulty to grasp. Aside from being a convenient way of self-improvement in academia, online apps are also effective platforms in which teenagers are able to make intimate friends with whom they can cooperate in the future long-term development, a core reason why I take it as a positive thing. Ċ However, everything, social media included, has side-effects. Although there exist a sea of advantages of social media, its defects are ignoble. To capture audience attention tightly, the media broadcasts a host of negative reports, resulting in irreversible repercussion to the whole society. Adolescents, who are innocent and naive, often lack experiences to differentiate merits from evils, thus imitating those irresponsible deeds exposed by social media, which produces a devastating consequence. In addition to that, the media can distort the truth by disclosing fake news to manipulate the public which lacks rudimentary critical thinking to judge wrong from right, making unnecessary reverberations. So the social media contains a train of shortcomings. Ċ In conclusion, it is hard to tell whether the advantages of social media outweigh its weaknesses or not. I would hold a view that it is neither detrimental nor helpful to teenagers.

prompt: "A person spends most of his or her time at the workplace, and life becomes meaningless when there is no job satisfaction." To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?"
essay: Nowadays, job satisfaction is one of the most essential elements of individual well-being. It is believed that job fulfillment renders workers a pointless life that they devote a large amount of time to nine to five jobs. However, I personally assert that there are other factors that are of greater concern than job satisfaction. Ċ It is crystal clear that if amusement cannot be found in their workplaces, it is hard for them to get higher promotions. To illustrate, they are likely to put in poor work performance that is not highly recognized by their boss and co-workers. Another reason is that such long-working hours without job fulfillment can wreak havoc on other aims in their lives. That is to say, limitations in social cycles are unavoidable for those who have occupied work schedules. For instance, it is hard to hang out with new friends and have a company with them, which lessens chronic stresses associated with workloads. Ċ Nevertheless, there are several justifications of the opposite viewpoint that I convinced. Firstly, in today's cut-throat labor market where thousand graduates face unemployment annually, they are more concerned about job security helping them to earn enough money to pay for mortgages, bills and everyday living costs for their families or their own because they have to put family responsibility ahead of their personal benefits. Secondly, working in a prosperous working environment can boost your wrongful mindset about the job. For example, some people decide to go on an unsatisfied job because of their successful colleague giving positive incentives to them. Ċ In conclusion, although some people conquer the statement that those who spend all day at work find life useless due to no satisfaction, I personally believe there are some other aims in life forcing them to keep their job.

prompt: Mobile phones have made life easier and anyone can use a mobile phone to answer or make work calls or home calls art any place 7 days a week. Do you think this development has more positive effects or negative effects on the individual and the society
essay: In the modern world, The technology is upgrade and make life simple such as phone, we used to communicate or answer the office calls and family calls at anytime at anywhere. I think this progress and more positive effect some negative effect. Because it is very comfortable and easy way to learn. However, it's miss used. In the coming paragraphs I will discuss both effects. Ċ Firstly, The mobile is an electronic gadget which makes life easier and more pleasant. Because it helps to communicate anywhere and we learn a lot of things through this electronic device. Furthermore, it improves our relationship, such as a man who live in United kingdom, he makes a call to contact with their relative. Because he do not come, but he makes better way to talk. Although it is the best device to earn money. For instance, nowadays, some people create a channel on YouTube and share their video with other people, it’s also earn money through steaming to sit at home. Ċ Secondly, this electronic media have some negative effects. If we use over mean whole day this phone will be affected on our eyes and mentally healthy. Therefore, some people do not get information through mobile, they used to acquire bad habits. Moreover, it was the cause of some unemployment. For example, before this improvement people used post offices to send their documents but nowadays people use email to send their papers. These facts Make unemployment. Ċ In conclusion, after analysing all the information I reach in my opinion, these developments have more positive effects compare with negative affect.

prompt: In many countries around the world, life expectancy is increasing. Ċ Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this situation and give your own opinion.
essay: Evidence suggests that a growing number of countries experience growth in the length of life. While there are many benefits to this phenomenon, there are some drawbacks to consider. In this essay, both sides will be discussed in detail followed by my own take on the matter. Ċ On the plus side, the advantages of life expectancy are manifold. To begin with, living longer enable the elderly to participate in the labour market and perform social roles such as caring for grandchildren. Simply put, society can use senior citizens experience and their talent. For instance, when a company get in trouble, they can get advice from retired managers or employees because they have more expended knowledge to aid the company to tackle obstacles. In addition, as they live longer, they can spend time doing what they really want like travelling, researching and etc. to discover and understand the true value of life. Ċ However, the downside cannot be ignored. Providing a lot of facilities for old people is demanding. In fact, governments should offer accommodations, recreational facilities and pensions, as a result, the state is more likely to face a shortage of land and resources so that this can bring conflict among people. Moreover, the longer people live the more pain they have to suffer and need to be hospitalized in order to get better treatment. This increases public health care expenditures. As a consequence, governments should allocate more budget on this issue. Ċ In conclusion, increasing life expectancy can be both rewarding and problematic. while they might contribute to boosting the community and gaining more opportunities to experience and learn more things, the elderly are now viewed as a burden on society because they need several facilities and their medical expenses are extremely high so I believe it would be a negative trend.

prompt: The topic: Some people believe that children learn better when they are placed in classes with children of similar abilities. Others believe that children learn better when they are in classes with children representing a diverse range of academic abilities. Discuss both views and give your opinion. learning environment for a child
essay: Some people suppose that the most effective learning way for children is to collaborate with many children of the similar academic levels. Others believe that it is more productive for children to learn with others having a broad diversity of knowledge, which I immensely concur with. Ċ The collaboration with superior friends brings many benefits to children's learing process. They can accquire more knowledge from various fields, which helps advance their self development accademically. As children study with smart peers, they can be able to explore what they are truly concerned about, which is completely good for their future orientation. Additionally, staying in such that good environment will push each kid forward, which is the tremendous source of motivation. Ċ Besides, such a cooperation with other children of the same levels aslo ripes some benefits. Since they stay in a normal environment like others, they will have an easier understanding about what their friends say. Therefore, they might not feel overwhelmed and confused by complicated things. Plus, the curriculum is not very difficult ;so, they do not feel under pressure much. Moreover, they will pick up new things with the ease. Ċ However, I believe that the non-pressure environment does not create many good children. This means that they might not get a large range of knowledge if they are not pressured or motivated by the environment. They can not be the best versions of themselves in academic aspects. Ċ In conclusion, learning in any environment is still good and brings some specific benefits for children. Nevertheless, whether they can be good children or not mostly depends on patience and determination that they put on their learning process.

prompt: Some people think that zoos are all cruel and should be closed down. Others, however, believe that zoos can be useful in protecting wild animals. Ċ Discuss both opinions and give your own opinion.
essay: Zoos still remain as one of the entertainment options for people. Some assert that they are ruthless towards animals and should be shut down, while others think that they contribute to animal welfare. In my opinion, most of them dreadfully affect animals. Ċ On the one hand, even if I admit that zoos are atrocious and severe to animals, some of them still have benefits. Firstly, they provide animals with food and water supplies so that they do not need to hunt for each other and wander around in order to find water. For instance, when they are in habitat, predators can easily hurt and eat other endangered animals and as a result, they significantly reduce their number. Secondly, some wildlife parks are able to create all necessary conditions for animals’ reproduction. A case in point is zoos in China. Though pandas are threatened and their number has considerably decreased in the last century, zoo employees recently managed to increase their number. Ċ On the other hand, there are many persuasive arguments why zoos should be closed. The first reason to consider is workers' inferior attitude towards animals. Unfortunately, nowadays a lot of animals are punished and beat in order to be tamed. Zoo owners forget about their feelings, cubs, and the fact that they were not born to be caged. Another factor to review is rough and undesirable conditions. Most of the zoos from all over the world provide animals with poor circumstances, such as cages, space limitations, and the lack of habitat. Finally, while it is fun and educational for people, most of the animals feel inconvenient among people staring at them and taking their photographs. Consequently, animals can get furious and pounce on them. Ċ To conclude, all animals should be protected and provided with good conditions. As most of the zoos are cruel to animals and not similar enough to their natural habitat, they should be closed, albeit some of them have great and auspicious conditions.

prompt: There is no longer enough natural resources to sustain current levels of economic growth. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
essay: Recently, the demands of natural resources have risen dramatically across the world due to population growth. Some people state that we have not enough resources. However, there are some individuals who disagree with this opinion. I agree that we are in scarce of the natural resources to meet the projected economical advancement. In this essay, the issues behind this phenomenon will be examined. Ċ On the one hand, some people state that if the number of natural resources will continue to decrease we cannot have a comfortable life because natural resources are limited. According to a government research in the USA shows that if this situation will continue, the petrol will lose in 2050. Moreover, it is widely said that the number of population in the world will increase. This will make the amount of natural resource decrease. Ċ On the other hand, there are some individuals who disagree with the above-mentioned perception. The demand for natural resources will be lessened owning to improving the technology. For example, the developments of technology such as electronic cars gave a positive impact in the society. By using this, we can decline the consumption of natural resources. Eventually, we will not need natural fuel. In my opinion, decreasing of natural resource is quite crisis, I think the loss of it give a negative impact in the society because even we won’t have a comfortable life any more. Ċ In conclusion, I agree with the idea that there are no longer enough natural resources available for human kind to sustain this situation. In order to defend our lives, the governments should take initiation to tackle this issue and besides that every individual also need to take some responsibility to put hands together with the authorities.

prompt: Some parents do not want their children to work part time while in school so that they can concentrate on their studies. Other parents believe their kids should learn to manage study and work duties as this teaches them certain skills they cannot learn at school and therefore better prepares them for the real world Discuss adv and dis of both views Part time job during study or not
essay: Some parents are unwilling to let their children work during their studies saying the school should be their sole focus, while others encourage their children to balance their studies with work. Both perspectives have their merits and drawback as this essay will demonstrate. Ċ Having a job is beneficial for developing some useful tools such as time management, networking and multitasking skills which are essential for one's career , regardless of the occupational goals. In this way , children learn to balamce their studies and work schedules and will be able to manage career and home live in the future as a result. Take for example working mothers, they do their tasks professionally and still have time to bring up children. Ċ Conversely, focused students are likely to achieve better academic results, thereby securing admission to higher-tier schools. It is because abilities to focus on one thing at time will reflect the ability to complete the task at a higher level of proficiency. Some argued tgat the modern workplaces now demand soft skills, where these children might come up short , unlike their peers who may develop these skills through their interaction with a great variety of people.Yet, as career become increasing specialized, the ability to hone particular skills may ultimately trump sociability. Ċ With the above in mind, it is clear both approaches have positive and negative aspects. While the part time workers may gain multitasking skills, the academic students benefit from a better focus on their task.

prompt: question :water is a natural resource which should be always free. governments should ban the sale of bottled water. at what extent do you agree or disagree
essay: People, all over the world, hunger for a clean safe water since our ecosystem including lakes and rivers is polluted and damaged in a diverse ways. Ċ As such, water, which is a natural resource that should be free in fact, has nowadays become a popular means of commodity. Although it is a basic right for human beings to have free access of water, In my opinion, I do not think it is necessary for governments should ban this practice for the following reasons. Ċ There are people who prefer bottled water over tap water. They may believe that bottled water tastes better than the ordinary one. And also, they might feel healthier when drinking germ-free bottled water, despite the fact that there is hardly any difference between bottled and tap water in terms of quality. Therefore, governments cannot ban this production as long as people, both in developing and developed nations could afford and have a particular choice over this bottled water. Ċ likewise, governments themselves benefitted through this system. Numerous private water companies have been mushrooming than ever before, since many governments do not have enough fund to provide clean and safe water to its civilians. However, it is possible for governments to utilize the money, which has come through taxation on these industries, in a positive way. For example, it can be used for public services like road, health and education system. Therefore, it might be a huge loss for them if they decide to ban this business. Ċ In summary, I would like to argue that governments might not be able to ban bottled water sale, since it is people's choice whether to drink tap water or bottled water. Moreover, there is no need for a government to ban this practice when it itself benefitting through this business.

prompt: Some parents allow their children to live independently, away from home. Other parents don't want their teenage children to live away from them. Which do you think is better & Why?
essay: It is undeniable that every parent has their own style to raise their children. Therefore, the vast majority of parents decided to send their children to other cities or countries to make them an independent individual, whereas, others insist their children to live with them. However, both viewpoints have their own justifications, but I am personally supporting the former viewpoint of parents with the detailed arguments in the following paragraphs. Ċ To begin with, some parents provide the liberty to their children about their choice of spending life and they support their offspring to live their own because they know that beyond the restrictions of their home, their kids could explore the best opportunities of a life and they could find a better job through which they could earn handsome amount of salary which is otherwise impossible if they would stay at their own home. In addition, while living an independent life children learn the various skills such as money management, punctuality. Indeed, there have been some recorded instances of children who live in the abroad countries without their parents and they could easily manage their priorities. Thus, the decision of parents to permit their children to live away from their own place is an absolute imperative. Ċ Conversely, some parents are much concerned, if their children opt to live separately, due to some reasons. As parents are attached to their kids that is why they have a fear of isolation because it is certainly difficult for them to live without their kids and they do not give permission to them to live in their own. In addition, some people think that if they will allow their children to stay away from their house, then they will indulge in a bad company which will spoil their future so they forbid their children from the individuality. For example, according to one research article, in India 60% youngsters have become drug addicts while staying at the hostels and other cities of the country. Overall, due to the emotional attachment and adoption of detrimental habits some parents have a desire to stay with their offsprings. Ċ In conclusion, it is true that everyone has a different perspective about the freedom of the children. As far as I concerned, it is enormously required to provide the freedom to the children to spend their life according to their own way so that they could escape the challenges and cope with the difficulties they may face while staying away from their parents and this decision of parents would be worthwhile in a long term.

prompt: Housing shortages in big cities cause great social consequences. Some think only governments action can solve this problem. To what extend do you agree or disagree? concern over housing crisis
essay: Nowadays overpopulation and crowding of large cities are considered a big problem in the world. In fact, to get a space in the city, needs deep pockets and labourous search to find an ideal place to live in.There are so many reasons closely linked to this issue, Some think that government is a major player in tackling housing crisis. Before explaining my suggestion , l propose a wider range of opinion on the subject matter. Ċ Clearly, increasing density of population correlates to the job opportunities and having livelihood in the big cities. It seems to be one of the biggest factors of having inadequate places to live in. Finding a carefully thought of a solution needed to deal with as so many students coming to study from different countries. They need accomodation to stay in during their period of study. Ċ As far as i am concerned, dealing with this issue needs a great help from government. Providing a wide range of council houses for the dwellers, in the cities are very beneficial to solve the housing shortcome. As well as reacommodating student halls, factories, and large companies to the outskirts of the cities and towns, which generally, influences the expansion of housing for a wider variety of people. Ċ In addition, increasing the price of rent by the house owners should be given a mention. Price cap should at least to be considered to control rent in those affected areas. Also make sure that landlords comply with it. Ċ In conclusion, the concern over housing crises is a ligitimate one. It does need the government support, by allocating a great budget and imposing some rules that can at least steady the housing crisis.

prompt: Even more people are interested in wearing fashionable clothes nowadays. Do you think it is a positive or a negative trend?
essay: Looking fit a modern world, we could find, that majority of people want to wear fashionable clothes. That fact has two sides, and the upcoming essay will discuss both of them before my final verdict. Ċ On the one hand, wearing clothes from fashion stores or from famous designers is not something disgusting or wrong. When someone chooses this way, it is, first of all, always his own deal, and nobody can say that it looks pompous or it is an irrational expense. However, there are some people, who wish to take apparel like this exclusively for the sake of feeling better, than the people around them. Also, there is a type of people, who spend their last money to purchase this vestiture, because society is imposed on them, so they can feel more confident and better, besides, it does not work like this. Ċ On the other hand, clothes from fashion house such as Christian Dior, Versace and Calvin Klein makes humanity a hostage of stores and endless spending. You either buy clothes from a new collection or become unfashionable. This problem is especially relevant among teenagers, since a "not fashionable" person may be subject to peer abuse ( many people know firsthand how cruel children and adolescents are). In this case, the only sure way out is clothes from mass markets with approximately the same price. Ċ To sum up, as per my perspective, wearing branded clothes is correct only in the sane community or then the person, who chooses to wear them knows how to defend personal boundaries and comprehends that others should not impute their opinion to him.

prompt: All people should go to university, even if they are not going to use that education In their job. Ċ Do you agree or disagree?
essay: Having a bachelor or a master degree seems to be the majority of employee lives. Some people might think that attending university is one of the significant achievements of your life, even though the knowledge might not be used in the working area. However, in my opinion, I completely disagree that we all have to go to university. Ċ To begin with, nowadays the accessibility of the internet is widespread, compared to the past. There are many online courses on the internet, which cost less expensive and precise our time. It is called freedom, for example, you can choose to study any field you are interested in, there is no limitation. Studying online could also be able to access anytime as you wish. Ċ Furthermore, instead of wasting our precious time on unnecessary study, which might not be used later, it is better to collect more on work experiences in the real world, not just in the theoretical framework. For instance, for developers, the most valuable occupation in the world, the best coding practice for them is not in the classroom, however, it is in the real circumstances. The reason is that when working in the company, they have met with many challenges, which is the time when our brains can develop to solve the problems as many as possible. Ċ To sum up, the educational institution is not always the answer for everyone. With online courses and work experiences, it is not necessary to apply for the university anymore. It is the choice of your life, you can choose whatever you think is the best suited for you.

prompt: Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? All high school students should be required to have three years of studying a foreign language. Use specific reasons and examples to support your opinion.
essay: I taught basic things about Arabic and English language when I was in high school. In that time, it was very hard for me and other students to learn two foreign languages, but now I am very thankful that my high school made us to learn. Learning foreign language is a skill that not only is very useful for our future college/university study and job but also is a way to learn about other people and cultures in the world. Ċ Learning a new language in high school can be very helpful when traveling to foreign countries or for study aboard. For example, now I like to get my master degree from a university in Europe or America. If I have not learned English in high school, I should study harder for TOEFL. Moreover, because English is an international language, I can travel more easily and with more confidence around the world. Ċ I know for getting many jobs knowing a foreign language is an advantage. For instance, in Canada both French and English are official languages of the country. So learning both languages in high school can make our resume stronger which helps our future job. Ċ Finally, learning a new language means learning about different people and knowing about their culture. In my opinion, it is very exciting to get to know other people by learning the language they speak. Having such experience in high school when we have more free time is very good. Ċ Learning a foreign language gives many opportunities to high school students; although it can be very hard to learn. I have learned Arabic and English when I was in high school and this helps me so much for getting a job and study aboard.

prompt: In most countries, with the widespread of the use of Internet, people have more freedom to choose to work and study at home instead of travelling to work or college. Do the advantages outweigh the disadvantages?
essay: Nowadays,our lives have been interacting with the modernity of technology and the internet is one of the prominent factors. Therefore, with the widespread use of the network, people have more spare time to choose the location that they want to perform instead of travelling. The purpose of this article is to justify whether the benefits outweigh the disadvantages. Ċ To begin with, there are many colleges that have been approaching technology in term of educating students at the moment. Plus, numerous useful apps can be connected to people via smartphone or laptop generates a convenient environment for international students and workers in order to pursue their work. Since moving is a type of trouble for attendants who are at a far distance to their buildings, however, these issues can be tackled with the help of the online network so that pupils will have more dedication to further on their pedagogical or commission.For example, Google company has been encouraging their staffs to work mobility that means labourers don't have to present themselves at the workplace as long as they are capable to accomplish their tasks. Ċ On the other hand, having such an environment of running can lead to a few complications. Firstly, there will be a lack of proper monitoring which causes a huge impact on human's character. To illustrate, students are presumable to cheat on their examination or the efficiency of a labourer can be deteriorated on the account of working for instance. Moreover, adolescences are expected to be lazy on duties and develop a crummy mindset habit. As a result, there is no one who is fit for trustworthy for a job in future and the effect will bring down one's country reputation. To sum up, this incident can happen if society allows a citizen to depend excessively on the accessibility to the internet gradually. Ċ To conclude, from the contents above, there are countless positive and negative points of manipulating the internet. Nonetheless, from my perspective point of view, I vigorously opine to the idea of the disadvantages are outweighing the advantages in term of internet consuming.

prompt: The government should control the internet to reduce cyber-crime and ensure safety of users. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?
essay: The increased use of internet has given rise to many serious problems such a cyber bullying, hacking cyber fraud etc. I agree with the notion that, government should take some steps to stop the undue usage of internet. Ċ To begin with, due to easy accessibility of internet, people are finding new ways to commit a crime. There are several fraudulent websites that are meant to hack the personal information of people like bank account details and residential address. Moreover, many people easily get trapped by these deceitful websites and lost their money. Even many internet users get suspicious emails from unknown people. For instance, many times I get emails of winning money and thus they ask me to give my bank information. To save people from such crime, the government should ban such dubious website. Various techniques such as a firewall should be used to monitor the continuous activities of these websites. Ċ In addition, the uncontrolled usage of the internet is making a negative impact on youngsters, many teenagers get addicted to pornographic websites and spoil their life. The Number of adolescents has become the victim of the cyber bullying, which resulted in many cases of suicides. For example, an online game named blue whale, asks children to do some unpleasant tasks that lead to many suicides among the children. So, the youngsters are the future of the country, there safety is the primary thing for us. Government should enforce stringent laws and punishment for cyber bullying. This practice may overcome the misuse of the Internet. Ċ In conclusion, in this era of media and technology, criminals use the internet as an easy source to do crime. Therefore, it is the responsibility of the government to save people's lives by controlling misleading information on the internet.

prompt: Some people believe that one-on-one lessons are better for learning while other think that group lessons are superior. Ċ Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
essay: According to certain people feedbacks given in private for learning is effective, whereas, others ponder that discussions in groups are suitable. In my opinion, I do agree with this notion because both are relevant and imperative to deliver the message as per the requirement. Ċ On the one hand, confidental meetings aid to prevent the conflicts among the workers. To be more precise, there are manifold conversation that needs to be done separately, such as feedback of an employee, sharing a monthly target of a team member, and a salary negotiation. These dialogues are top secret, therefore, the management prefer to debate with them in private. Moreover, in a personal talk the listener and the speaker gets ample time to seek out the issues and reach to the conclusion promptly because there is no third person available to exaggerate the topic. Thus, the focus does not shift to the other side and the integrity of the talk remains trustworthy. Ċ On the other hand, there are multifarious things that cannot be shared alone. Simply stating, in a coaching centre or in a school the teacher prefers to talk about mistakes or questions in front of an entire class, for instance, mathematic equations, scientific formulas, and exam strategies so that students grasp the adequate knowledge and ability to understand the fellow learners doubts as well. Theses learnings develop cognitive skills and take away the shyness of the infants as they learn to speak and answer the question in a mass gathering for their better future. Ċ In conclusion, I profoundly affirm that open discussion and group talks both have different instinct and useful to pass the information according to the necessity.

prompt: The unlimited use of cars may cause many problems. What are those problems? In order to reduce the problems, should we discourage people to use cars?
essay: With the increasing use of cars, many severe problems have arisen, such as air pollution, high energy consumption, car accidents etc. Ċ I think the biggest issue should be air pollution. The air pollution from cars is mainly caused by fuel emissions. Increased cars use causes more greenhouse gases to get emitted into the atmosphere; this traps more and more of the earth's heat, causing an overall warming to the planet's temperature. Since 1850, the eight warmest recorded years have all occurred since 1998. At the same time, fuel emissions such as carbon monoxide have a negative effect on blood and organs of the body. A new survey points out that carbon monoxide basically suffocates a person to death. The gas also intensifies cardiovascular disease in humans. Ċ However, automobiles also bring many benefits to our life. When you have your own car, you can go wherever you want, whenever you want, without being dependent on anyone else. So measures should be taken to solve these problems. For example, we can tap new energy to replace fossil fuel, such as solar energy, wind power, hydropower, etc. Currently, many car makers have rolled out green cars powered by electricity. Though there are lots of drawbacks in this type of car. But I think with the development of technology, these technical difficulties will be worked out. Ċ Additionally, the government should carry out laws to limit car emissions, and advocate pubic transport. I believe that the advantages of cars, in the long run, will outweigh its disadvantages.

prompt: Pollution of air, water and soil has become critical serious in last years and it takes millions of years to recoup. What are the main causes of pollution? Ċ How can we tackle this problem individually and globally?
essay: Nowadays ,air ,water as well as soil pollution is becoming critical serious. It would seem that it needs to spend million years to recoup. There are multiple causes of these issues. And there is much that can be done to tackle the problem constructively. Ċ Firstly ,there are many causes that human beings should consider. For example ,in most industrial countries all around the world where we can see advanced machines or appliances for agriculture ,food production is habitually low_quality because of the lack of useful materials in the soils as a result of creating high contamination levels by lorries and agricultural machines. These commodities are not suitable to eat and they could cause many incurable illnesses. Therefore ,this makes it clear there are numerous causes of contamination that we can not ignore. Ċ Secondly ,apart from persuasive reasons ,there is much that can be conducted to solve the problem effortlessly. For instance ,a possible approach would be for farmers. It means farmers should avoid enriching soil to plant crops. Allowing the environment to follow its own nature rules can tackle the trouble quickly. Another feasible approach would be for governments to ensure that farmers avoid exerting chemical materials that could generate contamination in diverse supplies. These methods are appropriate to create a reduction of pollution. As a result ,it becomes apparent there are many solutions behind each problem that can be performed. Ċ To summarise ,this is true that problems like this will not be solved quickly ,however, this is not a reason to avoid taking action. It is predicted that to assemble humans as well as authorities water , soil and air pollution will not be serious trouble in the near future.

prompt: Some people say that physical education classes are an important part of a child's education. Others believe that it is more important to focus on academics during school time. Ċ discus both these views, and give your opinion.
essay: A majority of people have different views about whether physical education is a critical subject or students should mainly concentrate on academics at school. In my opinion, I strongly agree with both views as each has its own merits. Ċ On the one hand, it is true that pupils need to learn physical education at school. The main reason is that this kind of activity is important for the students' healthy growth and development. For example, students are required to learn how to play sports such as badminton, basketball or football. By doing so, they would get better health and fit body. Also, physical education classes can help students relieve stress and anxiety and even build their social skills. For instance, students who have a hectic school life are already under pressure so playing with friends or outdoor activities might reduce their stress after academic classes. Ċ On the other hand, focusing on academics is truly beneficial to students in several ways. First of all, pupils can gain knowledge from a variety of fields, in particular, Mathematics, History and Economics, etc. Secondly, students who have excellent academic records might have a better future. As an example, they would have great opportunities to find a well-paid job for life. As far as I'm concerned, spending a little time each day being physically active can help children concentrate well on their school works. Ċ In conclusion, I believe that physical education classes can offer several advantages such as healthy growth, development and mental health. However, there are many good points in focusing on academics during school time in terms of widening childrens' knowledge and helping them have a better future.

prompt: it is believed that people who read for pleasure develop their imagination more and acquire better language skills compare to people who prefer watching television. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essay: There is a common perception that when we study for fun we gain more knowledge of how to communicate than individuals who rely on visuals like movies. In my opinion, I completely agree that reading is more beneficial for watching television. This essay will support the argument with proven examples. Ċ Creative thinking is developed by doing intellectual things regularly therefore folks who read interesting books tend to be more versatile in thinking. Also, ardent book readers are usually academicians, that is individuals who want to improve the world by studying and inventing new things. For instance,my university lecturer told me back in the days that he studies an average of ten books in a week. which is a difficult task for most folks. Ċ Subsequently, young adults who grew up studying regularly are more creative in their writing tasks. because as they read they take notes of the languages and vocabularies, they have the tendencies to search for new words they do not understand as they can easily pick up a dictionary to find words and meaning. For example, the Australian education department recent survey shows that there is a sharp decline in year ten student's writing module across the states because students spend a reasonable hour on screen rather than books. Ċ In conclusion, as humans,we should invest our time and energy in reading at lease a book in a day, no matter how small the book is to increase our knowledge power. instead of investing too much time in the screen.

prompt: To many parts in the world there is continuous coverage of sports opr television. some believe that this discourages young from taking part discuss both and give your opinion.
essay: Sports is the precedence of masses and in many realms oh the globe there is ongoing telecast for proper coverage of live sports action.However, many suggest that it discourages young ones to compete in sports whereas others disagree.My dissertation will shed light on both views with suitable examples; shaping my viewpoint at the end. Ċ To commence with, the sports shows are telecasted in order to provide continuation info to million sports fan out there. Due to this, it is often that many individuals leave their practices for enjoying the live-action of there signature players. For instance, it was recorded that during football WorldCup 2016 the training session of every city tumble with 70% and only a few were seen in the playing grounds. Consequently,the attention of young players can be distracted from there subjective physical games as they love to watch big events like world cups. Ċ On contrary,this trend can be highly beneficial as it inspires teenagers to perform better in their respective games. To elaborate, there are a plethora of sports formats especially league which comprises most native and young players, therefore, watching them can surge the motivation among the youth for becoming a sports player. For example, Virat Kohli the captain of Indian cricket team reveals that he grew up watching the great Sachin Tendulkar. So, the question arises, from where the prestige talent would have come? If there was no live streaming. Subsequently, the great performers inspire umpteen infant to rise in their games. Ċ In conclusion, Although, the matches distract the tenants , I believe, this is because there is affection toward te game which ultimately will uplift them to play for there nations, thus it is a positive development.

prompt: [b]this is the topic question: Some people think that the government should offer financial support and care to the elderly, while others think that people should save money for their future life. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion?
essay: Nowadays taking care of elders has become a discussional topic among the whole society. Some people believe that government should be responsible for looking after senior citizens and providing them monetary supports, while others think that individual save money for the future. My view is that these two ideas do not contradict with each other. Ċ The government should pay attention to take care of elders because senior citizens have contributed enough to the society when they were young. The government should spare no effort to improve the living condition after elders retire. To be more specific, the government could establish free nursing home, by doing so, professional staff and equipped facilities could deal with physical condition of the grey generation. Furthermore, if the elderly stay with peers, it may reduce the possibility of being loneliness. Ċ Conversely, individuals should be responsible for saving sufficient money for their future life. This is mainly because the government has limited budget for other purposes. It is unrealistic for the elderly to totally rely on the government's pension which can only cover basic living expense, and then live in an enjoyable life. If senior citizens wish to have a decent twilight years, they must prepare a plan at early stage. Ċ Moreover, family should also be obligated to take care of the elderly. The elderly should be encouraged to live with family, by doing so, it can enhance family intimacy. As a result, they can get rid of loneliness by spending great time with their offspring. Ċ In conclusion, the government should definitely provide financial aid to senior citizens. Meanwhile, individuals should also save up for their retirement. But more importantly, looking after the old is the responsibility of every member of our society.

prompt: These days noise and air pollution are serious environmental problems. Some people think that air travel is to be blamed. Others believe that we should reduce the number of vehicles on the roads.Discuss both these views and give your opinion.
essay: It is true that one of the greatest problems that the world is facing today is the environmental problem especially noise and air pollution . Some people argue that these problems are caused by the aviation industry , while others claim that the high number of cars that running on the road is the major cause . In my opinion, I take the view that the increasing of using cars remain the main source of this problem . Ċ On the one hand , there are some reasons that why people believe that air travel has harmful consequences on the environment. Firstly, since air travel became more affordable in recent decades, the number of flights around the globe has increased . Furthermore, flying is by far the most greenhouse-gas-intensive transportation mode. For example, one environmental scientist claimed that a transatlantic flight can create as large a carbon footprint . Additionally, aeroplane engines are extremely loud, and persons who live close to airports are exposed to constant engine noises that increase the risk of cardiovascular disease, hearing loss and stress, according to studies. Ċ On the other hand, those who hold the view that the high volume of autos on the road is responsible make valid points as well. A recently published study indicated that in 2015, 74% of all transport emissions were from road transport. This has resulted in a number of health-related issues, including respiratory and cardiovascular problems, as well as exacerbating pre-existing conditions such as asthma. Likewise, noise pollution like loud, can harm the eardrum, while sustained sounds at a lower volume like vehicular engines can damage the middle ear, with both causing permanent hearing loss. Ċ In conclusion, while both transport types have harmful effects on human health, as far as I am concerned, noise and air pollution caused by cars is a far greater problem because individuals use them more and spend more time in traffic, and therefore, they pose the greater health risk.

prompt: Topic: Whether parents should give money to praise their child for high marks, you agree or disagree parents should give school-age children money for get a high mark(grade) they get in the school.
essay: Every parent always want their children succeed in their life; however, parents have to let their children succeed in school first. In order to let children focus on their study, parents have to use thousand ways to achieve it. But I'm so wondering that is money a good and effective way? Ċ First, I think give money to praise children for high marks will let children focus on money too much. When I was a substitute teacher in elementary school, I saw a boy didn't want to do anything unless he can get some money from their parents or teacher. According that experience, I'm well aware of that money can't make a child good, but it can make a child addict in money at all. From then on, I began to remind parents as I can that not to take money for a tool of praise, otherwise children will take these money for granted. Ċ For all that, I think children still need to get something they really want after excellent performance in school, but not money. Every children want to get some praises form their parents or teachers who are important in their mind. Even adults want to get their boss' praises about their work. Besides, praises can make children more self-confidence. I believe children who are more self-confidence will make more success not only in school, but also in their life. Ċ To sum up, using money to praise children for their high marks is worse than better. Parents should be smart to use some appropriate words as praises to encourage children to focus on pursue their own succeed.

prompt: Today school should teach thier student how to suvive finacially in the world today t what extent do you agree or disagree
essay: In the current era, Financial management should be included in the institution’s curriculum in order to survive in a practical world. Personally, I strongly agree with this statement as pupils would gain large numbers of benefits from economic subjects. Ċ To start with, Nowadays, there are many subjects in school, which are not practical in the exact world, such as mathematic subjects which consist of arithmetic and number theory. Thus, adding financial management skills, which include saving, planning and growing money in the academic syllabus, provides many positive outcomes to individuals at an early stage of their life. For instance, the Srinakarinwirot university demonstration school in Bangkok successfully increased the acknowledgement of finance and awareness of economic issues that could affect them at an adult stage. As a result, those adolescents are seriously concerned about money management. Ċ Furthermore, Financial management is not only teaching about managing money but also gaining knowledge of investment. Investing in cryptocurrency is recently popular in wide ranges of age, especially in adolescents as It easily generates money in either short-term or long-term. However, most people would face a diversity of risks if they lack acknowledgement. Hence, the current school should include that subject in order to avoid losing the quantity of money at an early age and other horrible drawbacks. Ċ In conclusion, Educating younger individuals in academics about money management in daily life allows them to raise their knowledge and awareness, which can generate a bunch of money at a young age by investing in digital currency or other methods.

prompt: Some people purchase a home and others rent. Describe benefits of owning a home and renting. Compare and construct the two options and explain which you think be better for overseas students.
essay: Finding accommodation while study abroad is as important as finding a school for learning. There are various ways that people can select like purchasing a home, renting an apartment, homestay or living in a hall of residence on campus. Each choice has its own advantages and disadvantages. However, for overseas students living in a house off campus, owning a home is better than renting because of cost and relationship. Ċ The first reason that buying a house is better than renting in finance. Whereas, if overseas students purchase, they must to pay once, living in an apartment, they do not. People pay periodically as a month, two months, or three months. Studying in foreign, students will face a new life, there are a variety things that payment. Therefore, personal house is quite luxary and expensive while renting flat is more suitable for students. Ċ Another reason for purchasing a home compared to renting is relationship. Whereas living in a rented apartment, overseas students learn way to live with other people, living in a owning house do not. They meet many people coming from different nations and talk about the culture in their country together. Therefore, undergraduate can communicate better than students who buying a house. In addition, students frequently exchange of learning method, and help each other to progress. Generally, renting a home is a great opportunity to make new friends. Ċ In conclusion, living in a rented apartment is suitable like cheap cost and good relationship for students studying abroad than buying a home.
